54 MleRouter::MleRouter(ThreadNetif &aThreadNetif):
55  Mle(aThreadNetif),
56  mAdvertiseTimer(aThreadNetif.GetIp6().mTimerScheduler, &MleRouter::HandleAdvertiseTimer, NULL, this),
57  mStateUpdateTimer(aThreadNetif.GetIp6().mTimerScheduler, &MleRouter::HandleStateUpdateTimer, this),
58  mChildUpdateRequestTimer(aThreadNetif.GetIp6().mTimerScheduler, &MleRouter::HandleChildUpdateRequestTimer, this),
59  mAddressSolicit(OPENTHREAD_URI_ADDRESS_SOLICIT, &MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicit, this),
60  mAddressRelease(OPENTHREAD_URI_ADDRESS_RELEASE, &MleRouter::HandleAddressRelease, this)
61 {
62  mChallengeTimeout = 0;
63  mNextChildId = kMaxChildId;
64  mRouterIdSequence = 0;
65  memset(mChildren, 0, sizeof(mChildren));
66  memset(mRouters, 0, sizeof(mRouters));
67 
68  mNetworkIdTimeout = kNetworkIdTimeout;
69  mRouterUpgradeThreshold = kRouterUpgradeThreshold;
70  mRouterDowngradeThreshold = kRouterDowngradeThreshold;
71  mLeaderWeight = kLeaderWeight;
72  mFixedLeaderPartitionId = 0;
73  mMaxChildrenAllowed = kMaxChildren;
74 
75  SetRouterId(kInvalidRouterId);
76  mPreviousPartitionId = 0;
77  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = 0;
78  mRouterRoleEnabled = true;
79 }

81 bool MleRouter::IsRouterRoleEnabled(void) const
82 {
83  return mRouterRoleEnabled && (mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD);
84 }

86 void MleRouter::SetRouterRoleEnabled(bool aEnabled)
87 {
88  mRouterRoleEnabled = aEnabled;
89 
90  if (!mRouterRoleEnabled && (mDeviceState == kDeviceStateRouter || mDeviceState == kDeviceStateLeader))
91  {
92  BecomeDetached();
93  }
94 }

96 uint8_t MleRouter::AllocateRouterId(void)
97 {
98  uint8_t rval = kInvalidRouterId;
99 
100  // count available router ids
101  uint8_t numAvailable = 0;
102  uint8_t numAllocated = 0;
103 
104  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
105  {
106  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated)
107  {
108  numAllocated++;
109  }
110  else if (mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay == false)
111  {
112  numAvailable++;
113  }
114  }
115 
116  VerifyOrExit(numAllocated < kMaxRouters && numAvailable > 0, rval = kInvalidRouterId);
117 
118  // choose available router id at random
119  uint8_t freeBit;
120  freeBit = otPlatRandomGet() % numAvailable;
121 
122  // allocate router id
123  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
124  {
125  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated || mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay)
126  {
127  continue;
128  }
129 
130  if (freeBit == 0)
131  {
132  rval = AllocateRouterId(i);
133  ExitNow();
134  }
135 
136  freeBit--;
137  }
138 
139 exit:
140  return rval;
141 }
142 
143 uint8_t MleRouter::AllocateRouterId(uint8_t aRouterId)
144 {
145  uint8_t rval = kInvalidRouterId;
146  Router *router;
147 
148  router = GetRouter(aRouterId);
149  assert(router != NULL);
150 
151  VerifyOrExit(!router->mAllocated, rval = kInvalidRouterId);
152 
153  // init router state
154  router->mAllocated = true;
155  router->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
156  memset(&router->mMacAddr, 0, sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
157 
158  // bump sequence number
159  mRouterIdSequence++;
160  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
161  rval = aRouterId;
162 
163  otLogInfoMle("add router id %d", aRouterId);
164 
165 exit:
166  return rval;
167 }
168 
169 ThreadError MleRouter::ReleaseRouterId(uint8_t aRouterId)
170 {
171  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
172  Router *router = GetRouter(aRouterId);
173 
174  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL, error = kThreadError_InvalidArgs);
175  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState == kDeviceStateLeader, error = kThreadError_InvalidState);
176 
177  otLogInfoMle("delete router id %d", aRouterId);
178  router->mAllocated = false;
179  router->mReclaimDelay = true;
180  router->mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
181  router->mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
182 
183  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
184  {
185  if (mRouters[i].mNextHop == aRouterId)
186  {
187  mRouters[i].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
188  mRouters[i].mCost = 0;
189  }
190  }
191 
192  mRouterIdSequence++;
193  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
194  mNetif.GetAddressResolver().Remove(aRouterId);
195  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().RemoveBorderRouter(GetRloc16(aRouterId));
196  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
197 
198 exit:
199  return error;
200 }
201 
202 uint32_t MleRouter::GetLeaderAge(void) const
203 {
204  return Timer::MsecToSec(Timer::GetNow() - mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated);
205 }

207 ThreadError MleRouter::BecomeRouter(ThreadStatusTlv::Status aStatus)
208 {
209  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
210 
211  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState != kDeviceStateDisabled, error = kThreadError_InvalidState);
212  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState != kDeviceStateRouter, error = kThreadError_None);
213  VerifyOrExit(IsRouterRoleEnabled(), error = kThreadError_NotCapable);
214 
215  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
216  {
217  mRouters[i].mAllocated = false;
218  mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay = false;
219  mRouters[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
220  mRouters[i].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
221  }
222 
223  mAdvertiseTimer.Stop();
224  mNetif.GetAddressResolver().Clear();
225  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout = 0;
226 
227  switch (mDeviceState)
228  {
229  case kDeviceStateDetached:
230  SuccessOrExit(error = SendLinkRequest(NULL));
231  mStateUpdateTimer.Start(kStateUpdatePeriod);
232  break;
233 
234  case kDeviceStateChild:
235  SuccessOrExit(error = SendAddressSolicit(aStatus));
236  break;
237 
238  default:
239  assert(false);
240  break;
241  }
242 
243 exit:
244  return error;
245 }
246 
247 ThreadError MleRouter::BecomeLeader(void)
248 {
249  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
250  uint8_t routerId;
251  Router *router;
252 
253  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState != kDeviceStateDisabled, error = kThreadError_InvalidState);
254  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState != kDeviceStateLeader, error = kThreadError_None);
255  VerifyOrExit(IsRouterRoleEnabled(), error = kThreadError_NotCapable);
256 
257  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
258  {
259  mRouters[i].mAllocated = false;
260  mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay = false;
261  mRouters[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
262  mRouters[i].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
263  }
264 
265  routerId = IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId) ? AllocateRouterId(mPreviousRouterId) : AllocateRouterId();
266  router = GetRouter(routerId);
267  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL, error = kThreadError_NoBufs);
268 
269  SetRouterId(routerId);
270 
271  memcpy(&router->mMacAddr, mNetif.GetMac().GetExtAddress(), sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
272  mAdvertiseTimer.Stop();
273  mNetif.GetAddressResolver().Clear();
274 
275  if (mFixedLeaderPartitionId != 0)
276  {
277  SetLeaderData(mFixedLeaderPartitionId, mLeaderWeight, mRouterId);
278  }
279  else
280  {
281  SetLeaderData(otPlatRandomGet(), mLeaderWeight, mRouterId);
282  }
283 
284  mRouterIdSequence = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
285 
286  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().Reset();
287 
288  SuccessOrExit(error = SetStateLeader(GetRloc16(mRouterId)));
289 
290 exit:
291  return error;
292 }
293 
294 void MleRouter::StopLeader(void)
295 {
296  mNetif.GetCoapServer().RemoveResource(mAddressSolicit);
297  mNetif.GetCoapServer().RemoveResource(mAddressRelease);
298  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().StopLeader();
299  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().StopLeader();
300  mAdvertiseTimer.Stop();
301  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().Stop();
302  mNetif.UnsubscribeAllRoutersMulticast();
303 }
304 
305 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleDetachStart(void)
306 {
307  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
308 
309  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
310  {
311  mRouters[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
312  }
313 
314  StopLeader();
315  mStateUpdateTimer.Stop();
316 
317  return error;
318 }
319 
320 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleChildStart(otMleAttachFilter aFilter)
321 {
322  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
323  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout = (otPlatRandomGet() % mRouterSelectionJitter) + 1;
324 
325  StopLeader();
326  mStateUpdateTimer.Start(kStateUpdatePeriod);
327 
328  mNetif.SubscribeAllRoutersMulticast();
329 
330  VerifyOrExit(IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId), ;);
331 
332  switch (aFilter)
333  {
334  case kMleAttachSamePartition1:
335  case kMleAttachSamePartition2:
336 
337  // downgrade
338  if (GetActiveRouterCount() > mRouterDowngradeThreshold)
339  {
340  SendAddressRelease();
341 
342  // reset children info if any
343  if (HasChildren())
344  {
345  RemoveChildren();
346  }
347 
348  // reset routerId info
349  SetRouterId(kInvalidRouterId);
350  }
351  else if (HasChildren())
352  {
353  BecomeRouter(ThreadStatusTlv::kHaveChildIdRequest);
354  }
355 
356  break;
357 
358  case kMleAttachAnyPartition:
359  case kMleAttachBetterPartition:
360  if (HasChildren() &&
361  mPreviousPartitionId != mLeaderData.GetPartitionId())
362  {
363  BecomeRouter(ThreadStatusTlv::kParentPartitionChange);
364  }
365 
366  break;
367  }
368 
369 exit:
370 
371  if (GetActiveRouterCount() >= mRouterUpgradeThreshold &&
372  (!IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId) || !HasChildren()))
373  {
374  SetRouterId(kInvalidRouterId);
375  }
376 
377  return kThreadError_None;
378 }
379 
380 ThreadError MleRouter::SetStateRouter(uint16_t aRloc16)
381 {
382  if (mDeviceState != kDeviceStateRouter)
383  {
384  mNetif.SetStateChangedFlags(OT_NET_ROLE);
385  }
386 
387  SetRloc16(aRloc16);
388  mDeviceState = kDeviceStateRouter;
389  mParentRequestState = kParentIdle;
390  mParentRequestTimer.Stop();
391  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
392 
393  mNetif.SubscribeAllRoutersMulticast();
394  mRouters[mRouterId].mNextHop = mRouterId;
395  mPreviousPartitionId = mLeaderData.GetPartitionId();
396  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().Stop();
397  mStateUpdateTimer.Start(kStateUpdatePeriod);
398  mNetif.GetIp6().SetForwardingEnabled(true);
399  mNetif.GetIp6().mMpl.SetTimerExpirations(kMplRouterDataMessageTimerExpirations);
400 
401  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
402  {
403  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateRestored)
404  {
405  mChildUpdateRequestTimer.Start(kChildUpdateRequestPeriod);
406  break;
407  }
408  }
409 
410  otLogInfoMle("Mode -> Router");
411  return kThreadError_None;
412 }
413 
414 ThreadError MleRouter::SetStateLeader(uint16_t aRloc16)
415 {
416  if (mDeviceState != kDeviceStateLeader)
417  {
418  mNetif.SetStateChangedFlags(OT_NET_ROLE);
419  }
420 
421  SetRloc16(aRloc16);
422  mDeviceState = kDeviceStateLeader;
423  mParentRequestState = kParentIdle;
424  mParentRequestTimer.Stop();
425  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
426  AddLeaderAloc();
427 
428  mNetif.SubscribeAllRoutersMulticast();
429  mRouters[mRouterId].mNextHop = mRouterId;
430  mPreviousPartitionId = mLeaderData.GetPartitionId();
431  mStateUpdateTimer.Start(kStateUpdatePeriod);
432  mRouters[mRouterId].mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
433 
434  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().Start();
435  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().StartLeader();
436  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().StartLeader();
437  mNetif.GetCoapServer().AddResource(mAddressSolicit);
438  mNetif.GetCoapServer().AddResource(mAddressRelease);
439  mNetif.GetIp6().SetForwardingEnabled(true);
440  mNetif.GetIp6().mMpl.SetTimerExpirations(kMplRouterDataMessageTimerExpirations);
441 
442  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
443  {
444  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateRestored)
445  {
446  mChildUpdateRequestTimer.Start(kChildUpdateRequestPeriod);
447  break;
448  }
449  }
450 
451  otLogInfoMle("Mode -> Leader %d", mLeaderData.GetPartitionId());
452  return kThreadError_None;
453 }

490 
491 bool MleRouter::HandleAdvertiseTimer(void)
492 {
493  if ((mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) == 0)
494  {
495  return false;
496  }
497 
498  SendAdvertisement();
499 
500  return true;
501 }
502 
503 void MleRouter::ResetAdvertiseInterval(void)
504 {
505  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState == kDeviceStateRouter || mDeviceState == kDeviceStateLeader,);
506 
507  if (!mAdvertiseTimer.IsRunning())
508  {
509  mAdvertiseTimer.Start(
510  Timer::SecToMsec(kAdvertiseIntervalMin),
511  Timer::SecToMsec(kAdvertiseIntervalMax),
512  TrickleTimer::kModeNormal);
513  }
514 
515  mAdvertiseTimer.IndicateInconsistent();
516 
517 exit:
518  return;
519 }
520 
521 ThreadError MleRouter::SendAdvertisement(void)
522 {
523  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
524  Ip6::Address destination;
525  Message *message;
526 
527  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
528  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandAdvertisement));
529  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
530  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
531 
532  switch (GetDeviceState())
533  {
534  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
535  case kDeviceStateDetached:
536  assert(false);
537  break;
538 
539  case kDeviceStateChild:
540  break;
541 
542  case kDeviceStateRouter:
543  case kDeviceStateLeader:
544  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendRoute(*message));
545  break;
546  }
547 
548  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
549  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xff02);
550  destination.mFields.m16[7] = HostSwap16(0x0001);
551  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, destination));
552 
553  otLogInfoMle("Sent advertisement");
554 
555 exit:
556 
557  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
558  {
559  message->Free();
560  }
561 
562  return error;
563 }
564 
565 ThreadError MleRouter::SendLinkRequest(Neighbor *aNeighbor)
566 {
567  static const uint8_t detachedTlvs[] = {Tlv::kAddress16, Tlv::kRoute};
568  static const uint8_t routerTlvs[] = {Tlv::kLinkMargin};
569  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
570  Message *message;
571  Ip6::Address destination;
572 
573  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
574 
575  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
576  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandLinkRequest));
577  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendVersion(*message));
578 
579  switch (mDeviceState)
580  {
581  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
582  assert(false);
583  break;
584 
585  case kDeviceStateDetached:
586  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendTlvRequest(*message, detachedTlvs, sizeof(detachedTlvs)));
587  break;
588 
589  case kDeviceStateChild:
590  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
591  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
592  break;
593 
594  case kDeviceStateRouter:
595  case kDeviceStateLeader:
596  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendTlvRequest(*message, routerTlvs, sizeof(routerTlvs)));
597  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
598  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
599  break;
600  }
601 
602  if (aNeighbor == NULL)
603  {
604  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < sizeof(mChallenge); i++)
605  {
606  mChallenge[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
607  }
608 
609  mChallengeTimeout = (((2 * kMaxResponseDelay) + kStateUpdatePeriod - 1) / kStateUpdatePeriod);
610 
611  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChallenge(*message, mChallenge, sizeof(mChallenge)));
612  destination.mFields.m8[0] = 0xff;
613  destination.mFields.m8[1] = 0x02;
614  destination.mFields.m8[15] = 2;
615  }
616  else
617  {
618  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < sizeof(aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge); i++)
619  {
620  aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
621  }
622 
623  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChallenge(*message, aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge,
624  sizeof(aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge)));
625  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xfe80);
626  destination.SetIid(aNeighbor->mMacAddr);
627  }
628 
629  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, destination));
630 
631  otLogInfoMle("Sent link request");
632 
633 exit:
634 
635  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
636  {
637  message->Free();
638  }
639 
640  return error;
641 }
642 
643 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleLinkRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
644 {
645  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
646  Neighbor *neighbor = NULL;
647  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
648  ChallengeTlv challenge;
649  VersionTlv version;
650  LeaderDataTlv leaderData;
651  SourceAddressTlv sourceAddress;
652  TlvRequestTlv tlvRequest;
653  uint16_t rloc16;
654 
655  otLogInfoMle("Received link request");
656 
657  VerifyOrExit(GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateRouter ||
658  GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateLeader, ;);
659 
660  VerifyOrExit(mParentRequestState == kParentIdle, ;);
661 
662  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
663 
664  // Challenge
665  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kChallenge, sizeof(challenge), challenge));
666  VerifyOrExit(challenge.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
667 
668  // Version
669  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kVersion, sizeof(version), version));
670  VerifyOrExit(version.IsValid() && version.GetVersion() == kVersion, error = kThreadError_Parse);
671 
672  // Leader Data
673  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData) == kThreadError_None)
674  {
675  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
676  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.GetPartitionId() == mLeaderData.GetPartitionId(), ;);
677  }
678 
679  // Source Address
680  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kSourceAddress, sizeof(sourceAddress), sourceAddress) == kThreadError_None)
681  {
682  VerifyOrExit(sourceAddress.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
683 
684  rloc16 = sourceAddress.GetRloc16();
685 
686  if ((neighbor = GetNeighbor(macAddr)) != NULL && neighbor->mValid.mRloc16 != rloc16)
687  {
688  // remove stale neighbors
689  RemoveNeighbor(*neighbor);
690  neighbor = NULL;
691  }
692 
693  if (IsActiveRouter(rloc16))
694  {
695  // source is a router
696  neighbor = GetRouter(GetRouterId(rloc16));
697  VerifyOrExit(neighbor != NULL, error = kThreadError_Parse);
698 
699  if (neighbor->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
700  {
701  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo =
702  static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
703 
704  memcpy(&neighbor->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(neighbor->mMacAddr));
705  neighbor->mLinkInfo.Clear();
706  neighbor->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
707  neighbor->mLinkFailures = 0;
708  neighbor->mState = Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest;
709  }
710  else
711  {
712  VerifyOrExit(memcmp(&neighbor->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(neighbor->mMacAddr)) == 0, ;);
713  }
714  }
715  }
716  else
717  {
718  // lack of source address indicates router coming out of reset
719  VerifyOrExit((neighbor = GetNeighbor(macAddr)) != NULL, error = kThreadError_Drop);
720  }
721 
722  // TLV Request
723  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTlvRequest, sizeof(tlvRequest), tlvRequest) == kThreadError_None)
724  {
725  VerifyOrExit(tlvRequest.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
726  }
727  else
728  {
729  tlvRequest.SetLength(0);
730  }
731 
732  SuccessOrExit(error = SendLinkAccept(aMessageInfo, neighbor, tlvRequest, challenge));
733 
734 exit:
735  return error;
736 }
737 
738 ThreadError MleRouter::SendLinkAccept(const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo, Neighbor *aNeighbor,
739  const TlvRequestTlv &aTlvRequest, const ChallengeTlv &aChallenge)
740 {
741  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
742  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
743  static const uint8_t routerTlvs[] = {Tlv::kLinkMargin};
744  Message *message;
745  Header::Command command;
746  uint8_t linkMargin;
747 
748  command = (aNeighbor == NULL || aNeighbor->mState == Neighbor::kStateValid) ?
749  Header::kCommandLinkAccept : Header::kCommandLinkAcceptAndRequest;
750 
751  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
752  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, command));
753  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendVersion(*message));
754  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
755  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendResponse(*message, aChallenge.GetChallenge(), aChallenge.GetLength()));
756  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLinkFrameCounter(*message));
757  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendMleFrameCounter(*message));
758 
759  // always append a link margin, regardless of whether or not it was requested
760  linkMargin = LinkQualityInfo::ConvertRssToLinkMargin(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
761 
762  // add for certification testing
763  if (isAssignLinkQuality &&
764  (memcmp(aNeighbor->mMacAddr.m8, mAddr64.m8, OT_EXT_ADDRESS_SIZE) == 0))
765  {
766  linkMargin = mAssignLinkMargin;
767  }
768 
769  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLinkMargin(*message, linkMargin));
770 
771  if (aNeighbor != NULL && IsActiveRouter(aNeighbor->mValid.mRloc16))
772  {
773  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
774  }
775 
776  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < aTlvRequest.GetLength(); i++)
777  {
778  switch (aTlvRequest.GetTlvs()[i])
779  {
780  case Tlv::kRoute:
781  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendRoute(*message));
782  break;
783 
784  case Tlv::kAddress16:
785  VerifyOrExit(aNeighbor != NULL, error = kThreadError_Drop);
786  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendAddress16(*message, aNeighbor->mValid.mRloc16));
787  break;
788 
789  case Tlv::kLinkMargin:
790  break;
791 
792  default:
793  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_Drop);
794  }
795  }
796 
797  if (aNeighbor != NULL && aNeighbor->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
798  {
799  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < sizeof(aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge); i++)
800  {
801  aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
802  }
803 
804  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChallenge(*message, aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge,
805  sizeof(aNeighbor->mPending.mChallenge)));
806  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendTlvRequest(*message, routerTlvs, sizeof(routerTlvs)));
807  aNeighbor->mState = Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest;
808  }
809 
810  if (aMessageInfo.GetSockAddr().IsMulticast())
811  {
812  SuccessOrExit(error = AddDelayedResponse(*message, aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr(),
813  (otPlatRandomGet() % kMaxResponseDelay) + 1));
814 
815  otLogInfoMle("Delayed link accept");
816  }
817  else
818  {
819  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr()));
820 
821  otLogInfoMle("Sent link accept");
822  }
823 
824 exit:
825 
826  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
827  {
828  message->Free();
829  }
830 
831  return error;
832 }
833 
834 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleLinkAccept(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
835  uint32_t aKeySequence)
836 {
837  otLogInfoMle("Received link accept");
838  return HandleLinkAccept(aMessage, aMessageInfo, aKeySequence, false);
839 }
840 
841 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleLinkAcceptAndRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
842  uint32_t aKeySequence)
843 {
844  otLogInfoMle("Received link accept and request");
845  return HandleLinkAccept(aMessage, aMessageInfo, aKeySequence, true);
846 }
847 
848 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleLinkAccept(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
849  uint32_t aKeySequence, bool aRequest)
850 {
851  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
852  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
853  Router *router;
854  Neighbor *neighbor;
855  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
856  VersionTlv version;
857  ResponseTlv response;
858  SourceAddressTlv sourceAddress;
859  LinkFrameCounterTlv linkFrameCounter;
860  MleFrameCounterTlv mleFrameCounter;
861  uint8_t routerId;
862  Address16Tlv address16;
863  RouteTlv route;
864  LeaderDataTlv leaderData;
865  LinkMarginTlv linkMargin;
866  ChallengeTlv challenge;
867  TlvRequestTlv tlvRequest;
868 
869  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
870 
871  // Version
872  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kVersion, sizeof(version), version));
873  VerifyOrExit(version.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
874 
875  // Response
876  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kResponse, sizeof(response), response));
877  VerifyOrExit(response.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
878 
879  // Source Address
880  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kSourceAddress, sizeof(sourceAddress), sourceAddress));
881  VerifyOrExit(sourceAddress.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
882 
883  // Remove stale neighbors
884  if ((neighbor = GetNeighbor(macAddr)) != NULL &&
885  neighbor->mValid.mRloc16 != sourceAddress.GetRloc16())
886  {
887  RemoveNeighbor(*neighbor);
888  }
889 
890  // Link-Layer Frame Counter
891  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLinkFrameCounter, sizeof(linkFrameCounter),
892  linkFrameCounter));
893  VerifyOrExit(linkFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
894 
895  // MLE Frame Counter
896  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kMleFrameCounter, sizeof(mleFrameCounter), mleFrameCounter) ==
897  kThreadError_None)
898  {
899  VerifyOrExit(mleFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
900  }
901  else
902  {
903  mleFrameCounter.SetFrameCounter(linkFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter());
904  }
905 
906  VerifyOrExit(IsActiveRouter(sourceAddress.GetRloc16()), error = kThreadError_Parse);
907 
908  routerId = GetRouterId(sourceAddress.GetRloc16());
909  router = GetRouter(routerId);
910 
911  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL, error = kThreadError_Parse);
912 
913  // verify response
914  switch (router->mState)
915  {
916  case Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest:
917  VerifyOrExit(memcmp(router->mPending.mChallenge, response.GetResponse(), sizeof(router->mPending.mChallenge)) == 0,
918  error = kThreadError_Error);
919  break;
920 
921  case Neighbor::kStateInvalid:
922  VerifyOrExit((mChallengeTimeout > 0) && (memcmp(mChallenge, response.GetResponse(), sizeof(mChallenge)) == 0),
923  error = kThreadError_Error);
924  break;
925 
926  default:
927  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_InvalidState);
928  }
929 
930  switch (mDeviceState)
931  {
932  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
933  assert(false);
934  break;
935 
936  case kDeviceStateDetached:
937  // Address16
938  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kAddress16, sizeof(address16), address16));
939  VerifyOrExit(address16.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
940  VerifyOrExit(GetRloc16() == address16.GetRloc16(), error = kThreadError_Drop);
941 
942  // Route
943  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kRoute, sizeof(route), route));
944  VerifyOrExit(route.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
945  SuccessOrExit(error = ProcessRouteTlv(route));
946 
947  // Leader Data
948  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData));
949  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
950  SetLeaderData(leaderData.GetPartitionId(), leaderData.GetWeighting(), leaderData.GetLeaderRouterId());
951 
952  if (mLeaderData.GetLeaderRouterId() == GetRouterId(GetRloc16()))
953  {
954  SetStateLeader(GetRloc16());
955  }
956  else
957  {
958  static const uint8_t tlvs[] = {Tlv::kNetworkData};
959  SetStateRouter(GetRloc16());
960  mRetrieveNewNetworkData = true;
961  SendDataRequest(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr(), tlvs, sizeof(tlvs), 0);
962  }
963 
964  break;
965 
966  case kDeviceStateChild:
967  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLinkMargin, sizeof(linkMargin), linkMargin));
968  VerifyOrExit(linkMargin.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
969  router->mLinkQualityOut = LinkQualityInfo::ConvertLinkMarginToLinkQuality(linkMargin.GetLinkMargin());
970  break;
971 
972  case kDeviceStateRouter:
973  case kDeviceStateLeader:
974  // Leader Data
975  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData));
976  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
977  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.GetPartitionId() == mLeaderData.GetPartitionId(), ;);
978 
979  // Link Margin
980  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLinkMargin, sizeof(linkMargin), linkMargin));
981  VerifyOrExit(linkMargin.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
982  router->mLinkQualityOut = LinkQualityInfo::ConvertLinkMarginToLinkQuality(linkMargin.GetLinkMargin());
983 
984  // update routing table
985  if (routerId != mRouterId && !IsRouterIdValid(router->mNextHop))
986  {
987  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
988  }
989 
990  break;
991  }
992 
993  // finish link synchronization
994  memcpy(&router->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
995  router->mValid.mRloc16 = sourceAddress.GetRloc16();
996  router->mValid.mLinkFrameCounter = linkFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
997  router->mValid.mMleFrameCounter = mleFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
998  router->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
999  router->mMode = ModeTlv::kModeFFD | ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle | ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData;
1000  router->mLinkInfo.Clear();
1001  router->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
1002  router->mLinkFailures = 0;
1003  router->mState = Neighbor::kStateValid;
1004  router->mKeySequence = aKeySequence;
1005 
1006  if (aRequest)
1007  {
1008  // Challenge
1009  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kChallenge, sizeof(challenge), challenge));
1010  VerifyOrExit(challenge.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1011 
1012  // TLV Request
1013  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTlvRequest, sizeof(tlvRequest), tlvRequest) == kThreadError_None)
1014  {
1015  VerifyOrExit(tlvRequest.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1016  }
1017  else
1018  {
1019  tlvRequest.SetLength(0);
1020  }
1021 
1022  SuccessOrExit(error = SendLinkAccept(aMessageInfo, router, tlvRequest, challenge));
1023  }
1024 
1025 exit:
1026  return error;
1027 }
1028 
1029 Child *MleRouter::NewChild(void)
1030 {
1031  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1032  {
1033  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateInvalid)
1034  {
1035  return &mChildren[i];
1036  }
1037  }
1038 
1039  return NULL;
1040 }
1041 
1042 Child *MleRouter::FindChild(uint16_t aChildId)
1043 {
1044  Child *rval = NULL;
1045 
1046  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1047  {
1048  if (mChildren[i].mState != Neighbor::kStateInvalid &&
1049  GetChildId(mChildren[i].mValid.mRloc16) == aChildId)
1050  {
1051  ExitNow(rval = &mChildren[i]);
1052  }
1053  }
1054 
1055 exit:
1056  return rval;
1057 }
1058 
1059 Child *MleRouter::FindChild(const Mac::ExtAddress &aAddress)
1060 {
1061  Child *rval = NULL;
1062 
1063  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1064  {
1065  if (mChildren[i].mState != Neighbor::kStateInvalid &&
1066  memcmp(&mChildren[i].mMacAddr, &aAddress, sizeof(mChildren[i].mMacAddr)) == 0)
1067  {
1068  ExitNow(rval = &mChildren[i]);
1069  }
1070  }
1071 
1072 exit:
1073  return rval;
1074 }

1076 uint8_t MleRouter::LqiToCost(uint8_t aLqi)
1077 {
1078  switch (aLqi)
1079  {
1080  case 1:
1081  return kLqi1LinkCost;
1082 
1083  case 2:
1084  return kLqi2LinkCost;
1085 
1086  case 3:
1087  return kLqi3LinkCost;
1088 
1089  default:
1090  return kLqi0LinkCost;
1091  }
1092 }
1093 
1094 uint8_t MleRouter::GetLinkCost(uint8_t aRouterId)
1095 {
1096  uint8_t rval = kMaxRouteCost;
1097  Router *router;
1098 
1099  router = GetRouter(aRouterId);
1100 
1101  // NULL aRouterId indicates non-existing next hop, hence return kMaxRouteCost for it.
1102  VerifyOrExit(aRouterId != mRouterId && router != NULL && router->mState == Neighbor::kStateValid,);
1103 
1104  rval = router->mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor());
1105 
1106  if (rval > router->mLinkQualityOut)
1107  {
1108  rval = router->mLinkQualityOut;
1109  }
1110 
1111  // add for certification testing
1112  if (isAssignLinkQuality && (memcmp(router->mMacAddr.m8, mAddr64.m8, OT_EXT_ADDRESS_SIZE) == 0))
1113  {
1114  rval = mAssignLinkQuality;
1115  }
1116 
1117  rval = LqiToCost(rval);
1118 
1119 exit:
1120  return rval;
1121 }
1122 
1123 ThreadError MleRouter::ProcessRouteTlv(const RouteTlv &aRoute)
1124 {
1125  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
1126 
1127  mRouterIdSequence = aRoute.GetRouterIdSequence();
1128  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
1129 
1130  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1131  {
1132  bool old = mRouters[i].mAllocated;
1133  mRouters[i].mAllocated = aRoute.IsRouterIdSet(i);
1134 
1135  if (old && !mRouters[i].mAllocated)
1136  {
1137  mRouters[i].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
1138  mNetif.GetAddressResolver().Remove(i);
1139  }
1140  }
1141 
1142  if (GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateRouter && !mRouters[mRouterId].mAllocated)
1143  {
1144  BecomeDetached();
1145  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_NoRoute);
1146  }
1147 
1148 exit:
1149  return error;
1150 }
1151 
1152 bool MleRouter::IsSingleton(void)
1153 {
1154  bool rval = true;
1155 
1156  switch (mDeviceState)
1157  {
1158  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
1159  case kDeviceStateDetached:
1160  ExitNow(rval = true);
1161  break;
1162 
1163  case kDeviceStateChild:
1164  ExitNow(rval = ((mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) == 0));
1165  break;
1166 
1167  case kDeviceStateRouter:
1168  ExitNow(rval = false);
1169  break;
1170 
1171  case kDeviceStateLeader:
1172 
1173  // not a singleton if any other routers exist
1174  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1175  {
1176  if (i != mRouterId && mRouters[i].mAllocated)
1177  {
1178  ExitNow(rval = false);
1179  }
1180  }
1181 
1182  // not a singleton if any children are REEDs
1183  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1184  {
1185  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid && (mChildren[i].mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD))
1186  {
1187  ExitNow(rval = false);
1188  }
1189  }
1190 
1191  break;
1192  }
1193 
1194 exit:
1195  return rval;
1196 }
1197 
1198 int MleRouter::ComparePartitions(bool aSingletonA, const LeaderDataTlv &aLeaderDataA,
1199  bool aSingletonB, const LeaderDataTlv &aLeaderDataB)
1200 {
1201  int rval = 0;
1202 
1203  if (aSingletonA != aSingletonB)
1204  {
1205  ExitNow(rval = aSingletonB ? 1 : -1);
1206  }
1207 
1208  if (aLeaderDataA.GetWeighting() != aLeaderDataB.GetWeighting())
1209  {
1210  ExitNow(rval = aLeaderDataA.GetWeighting() > aLeaderDataB.GetWeighting() ? 1 : -1);
1211  }
1212 
1213  if (aLeaderDataA.GetPartitionId() != aLeaderDataB.GetPartitionId())
1214  {
1215  ExitNow(rval = aLeaderDataA.GetPartitionId() > aLeaderDataB.GetPartitionId() ? 1 : -1);
1216  }
1217 
1218 exit:
1219  return rval;
1220 }
1221 
1222 uint8_t MleRouter::GetActiveRouterCount(void) const
1223 {
1224  uint8_t rval = 0;
1225 
1226  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1227  {
1228  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated)
1229  {
1230  rval++;
1231  }
1232  }
1233 
1234  return rval;
1235 }
1236 
1237 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleAdvertisement(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
1238 {
1239  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
1240  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
1241  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
1242  SourceAddressTlv sourceAddress;
1243  LeaderDataTlv leaderData;
1244  RouteTlv route;
1245  uint32_t partitionId;
1246  Router *router;
1247  Neighbor *neighbor;
1248  uint8_t routerId;
1249  uint8_t routerCount;
1250 
1251  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
1252 
1253  // Source Address
1254  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kSourceAddress, sizeof(sourceAddress), sourceAddress));
1255  VerifyOrExit(sourceAddress.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1256 
1257  // Remove stale neighbors
1258  if ((neighbor = GetNeighbor(macAddr)) != NULL &&
1259  neighbor->mValid.mRloc16 != sourceAddress.GetRloc16())
1260  {
1261  RemoveNeighbor(*neighbor);
1262  }
1263 
1264  // Leader Data
1265  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData));
1266  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1267 
1268  // Route Data
1269  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kRoute, sizeof(route), route));
1270  VerifyOrExit(route.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1271 
1272  partitionId = leaderData.GetPartitionId();
1273 
1274  if (partitionId != mLeaderData.GetPartitionId())
1275  {
1276  otLogDebgMle("different partition! %d %d %d %d",
1277  leaderData.GetWeighting(), partitionId,
1278  mLeaderData.GetWeighting(), mLeaderData.GetPartitionId());
1279 
1280  if (partitionId == mLastPartitionId && (mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD))
1281  {
1282  VerifyOrExit((static_cast<int8_t>(route.GetRouterIdSequence() - mLastPartitionRouterIdSequence) > 0),
1283  error = kThreadError_Drop);
1284  }
1285 
1286  if (GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateChild &&
1287  (memcmp(&mParent.mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(mParent.mMacAddr)) == 0 || !(mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD)))
1288  {
1289  ExitNow();
1290  }
1291 
1292  routerCount = 0;
1293 
1294  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1295  {
1296  if (route.IsRouterIdSet(i))
1297  {
1298  routerCount++;
1299  }
1300  }
1301 
1302  if (ComparePartitions(routerCount <= 1, leaderData, IsSingleton(), mLeaderData) > 0)
1303  {
1304  otLogDebgMle("trying to migrate");
1305  BecomeChild(kMleAttachBetterPartition);
1306  }
1307 
1308  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_Drop);
1309  }
1310  else if (leaderData.GetLeaderRouterId() != GetLeaderId())
1311  {
1312  if (GetDeviceState() != kDeviceStateChild)
1313  {
1314  BecomeDetached();
1315  error = kThreadError_Drop;
1316  }
1317 
1318  ExitNow();
1319  }
1320 
1321  VerifyOrExit(IsActiveRouter(sourceAddress.GetRloc16()), ;);
1322  routerId = GetRouterId(sourceAddress.GetRloc16());
1323  router = GetRouter(routerId);
1324  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL, error = kThreadError_Parse);
1325 
1326  if ((mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) &&
1327  static_cast<int8_t>(route.GetRouterIdSequence() - mRouterIdSequence) > 0)
1328  {
1329  bool processRouteTlv = false;
1330 
1331  switch (mDeviceState)
1332  {
1333  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
1334  case kDeviceStateDetached:
1335  break;
1336 
1337  case kDeviceStateChild:
1338  if ((sourceAddress.GetRloc16() == mParent.mValid.mRloc16) ||
1339  (router->mState == Neighbor::kStateValid))
1340  {
1341  processRouteTlv = true;
1342  }
1343 
1344  break;
1345 
1346  case kDeviceStateRouter:
1347  case kDeviceStateLeader:
1348  processRouteTlv = true;
1349  break;
1350  }
1351 
1352  if (processRouteTlv)
1353  {
1354  SuccessOrExit(error = ProcessRouteTlv(route));
1355  }
1356  }
1357 
1358  switch (GetDeviceState())
1359  {
1360  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
1361  case kDeviceStateDetached:
1362  ExitNow();
1363 
1364  case kDeviceStateChild:
1365  if ((sourceAddress.GetRloc16() == mParent.mValid.mRloc16 || router->mState == Neighbor::kStateValid) &&
1366  (mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) &&
1367  (mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout == 0) &&
1368  (GetActiveRouterCount() < mRouterUpgradeThreshold))
1369  {
1370  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout = (otPlatRandomGet() % mRouterSelectionJitter) + 1;
1371  ExitNow();
1372  }
1373 
1374  if (memcmp(&mParent.mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(mParent.mMacAddr)) == 0)
1375  {
1376  router = &mParent;
1377 
1378  if (mParent.mValid.mRloc16 != sourceAddress.GetRloc16())
1379  {
1380  SetStateDetached();
1381  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_NoRoute);
1382  }
1383 
1384  if (mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD)
1385  {
1386  for (uint8_t i = 0, routeCount = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1387  {
1388  if (route.IsRouterIdSet(i) == false)
1389  {
1390  continue;
1391  }
1392 
1393  if (i != GetLeaderId())
1394  {
1395  routeCount++;
1396  continue;
1397  }
1398 
1399  if (route.GetRouteCost(routeCount) > 0)
1400  {
1401  mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mNextHop = routerId;
1402  mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mCost = route.GetRouteCost(routeCount);
1403  }
1404  else
1405  {
1406  mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
1407  mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mCost = 0;
1408  }
1409 
1410  break;
1411  }
1412  }
1413  }
1414  else if ((mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) && (router->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid))
1415  {
1416  memcpy(&router->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
1417  router->mLinkInfo.Clear();
1418  router->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
1419  router->mLinkFailures = 0;
1420  router->mState = Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest;
1421  SendLinkRequest(router);
1422  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_NoRoute);
1423  }
1424 
1425  router->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
1426 
1427  ExitNow();
1428 
1429  case kDeviceStateRouter:
1430  // check current active router number
1431  routerCount = 0;
1432 
1433  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1434  {
1435  if (route.IsRouterIdSet(i))
1436  {
1437  routerCount++;
1438  }
1439  }
1440 
1441  if (routerCount > mRouterDowngradeThreshold &&
1442  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout == 0 &&
1443  HasMinDowngradeNeighborRouters() &&
1444  HasSmallNumberOfChildren() &&
1445  HasOneNeighborwithComparableConnectivity(route, routerId))
1446  {
1447  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout = (otPlatRandomGet() % mRouterSelectionJitter) + 1;
1448  }
1449 
1450  // fall through
1451 
1452  case kDeviceStateLeader:
1453 
1454  // router is not in list, reject
1455  if (!router->mAllocated)
1456  {
1457  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_NoRoute);
1458  }
1459 
1460  // Send link request if no link to router
1461  if (router->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
1462  {
1463  memcpy(&router->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
1464  router->mLinkInfo.Clear();
1465  router->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
1466  router->mLinkFailures = 0;
1467  router->mState = Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest;
1468  router->mDataRequest = false;
1469  SendLinkRequest(router);
1470  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_NoRoute);
1471  }
1472 
1473  router->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
1474  break;
1475  }
1476 
1477  UpdateRoutes(route, routerId);
1478 
1479  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLocal().SendServerDataNotification();
1480 
1481 exit:
1482  return error;
1483 }
1484 
1485 void MleRouter::UpdateRoutes(const RouteTlv &aRoute, uint8_t aRouterId)
1486 {
1487  uint8_t curCost;
1488  uint8_t newCost;
1489  uint8_t oldNextHop;
1490  uint8_t cost;
1491  uint8_t lqi;
1492  bool update;
1493 
1494  // update routes
1495  do
1496  {
1497  update = false;
1498 
1499  for (uint8_t i = 0, routeCount = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1500  {
1501  if (aRoute.IsRouterIdSet(i) == false)
1502  {
1503  continue;
1504  }
1505 
1506  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated == false)
1507  {
1508  routeCount++;
1509  continue;
1510  }
1511 
1512  if (i == mRouterId)
1513  {
1514  lqi = aRoute.GetLinkQualityIn(routeCount);
1515 
1516  if (mRouters[aRouterId].mLinkQualityOut != lqi)
1517  {
1518  mRouters[aRouterId].mLinkQualityOut = lqi;
1519  update = true;
1520  }
1521  }
1522  else
1523  {
1524  oldNextHop = mRouters[i].mNextHop;
1525 
1526  if (i == aRouterId)
1527  {
1528  cost = 0;
1529  }
1530  else
1531  {
1532  cost = aRoute.GetRouteCost(routeCount);
1533 
1534  if (cost == 0)
1535  {
1536  cost = kMaxRouteCost;
1537  }
1538  }
1539 
1540  if (!IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[i].mNextHop) || mRouters[i].mNextHop == aRouterId)
1541  {
1542  // route has no nexthop or nexthop is neighbor (sender)
1543 
1544  if (i != aRouterId)
1545  {
1546  if (cost + GetLinkCost(aRouterId) <= kMaxRouteCost)
1547  {
1548  if (!IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[i].mNextHop) && GetLinkCost(i) >= kMaxRouteCost)
1549  {
1550  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
1551  }
1552 
1553  mRouters[i].mNextHop = aRouterId;
1554  mRouters[i].mCost = cost;
1555  }
1556  else if (mRouters[i].mNextHop == aRouterId)
1557  {
1558  if (GetLinkCost(i) >= kMaxRouteCost)
1559  {
1560  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
1561  }
1562 
1563  mRouters[i].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
1564  mRouters[i].mCost = 0;
1565  mRouters[i].mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
1566  }
1567  }
1568  }
1569  else
1570  {
1571  curCost = mRouters[i].mCost + GetLinkCost(mRouters[i].mNextHop);
1572  newCost = cost + GetLinkCost(aRouterId);
1573 
1574  if (newCost < curCost && i != aRouterId)
1575  {
1576  mRouters[i].mNextHop = aRouterId;
1577  mRouters[i].mCost = cost;
1578  }
1579  }
1580 
1581  update |= mRouters[i].mNextHop != oldNextHop;
1582  }
1583 
1584  routeCount++;
1585  }
1586  }
1587  while (update);
1588 
1589 #if 1
1590 
1591  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1592  {
1593  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated == false || !IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[i].mNextHop))
1594  {
1595  continue;
1596  }
1597 
1598  otLogDebgMle("%x: %x %d %d %d %d",
1599  GetRloc16(i),
1600  GetRloc16(mRouters[i].mNextHop),
1601  mRouters[i].mCost,
1602  GetLinkCost(i), mRouters[i].mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor()),
1603  mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut);
1604  }
1605 
1606 #endif
1607 }
1608 
1609 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleParentRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
1610 {
1611  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
1612  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
1613  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
1614  VersionTlv version;
1615  ScanMaskTlv scanMask;
1616  ChallengeTlv challenge;
1617  Child *child;
1618 
1619  otLogInfoMle("Received parent request");
1620 
1621  // A Router MUST NOT send an MLE Parent Response if:
1622 
1623  // 1. It has no available Child capacity (if Max Child Count minus
1624  // Child Count would be equal to zero)
1625  // ==> verified below when allocating a child entry
1626 
1627  // 2. It is disconnected from its Partition (that is, it has not
1628  // received an updated ID sequence number within LEADER_TIMEOUT
1629  // seconds
1630  VerifyOrExit(GetLeaderAge() < mNetworkIdTimeout, error = kThreadError_Drop);
1631 
1632  // 3. Its current routing path cost to the Leader is infinite.
1633  VerifyOrExit(GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateLeader ||
1634  GetLinkCost(GetLeaderId()) < kMaxRouteCost ||
1635  (GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateChild && mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mCost + 1 < kMaxRouteCost) ||
1636  (mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mCost + GetLinkCost(mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mNextHop) < kMaxRouteCost),
1637  error = kThreadError_Drop);
1638 
1639  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
1640 
1641  // Version
1642  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kVersion, sizeof(version), version));
1643  VerifyOrExit(version.IsValid() && version.GetVersion() == kVersion, error = kThreadError_Parse);
1644 
1645  // Scan Mask
1646  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kScanMask, sizeof(scanMask), scanMask));
1647  VerifyOrExit(scanMask.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1648 
1649  switch (GetDeviceState())
1650  {
1651  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
1652  case kDeviceStateDetached:
1653  ExitNow();
1654 
1655  case kDeviceStateChild:
1656  VerifyOrExit(scanMask.IsEndDeviceFlagSet(), ;);
1657  break;
1658 
1659  case kDeviceStateRouter:
1660  case kDeviceStateLeader:
1661  VerifyOrExit(scanMask.IsRouterFlagSet(), ;);
1662  break;
1663  }
1664 
1665  // Challenge
1666  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kChallenge, sizeof(challenge), challenge));
1667  VerifyOrExit(challenge.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
1668 
1669  child = FindChild(macAddr);
1670 
1671  if (child != NULL && !(child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD))
1672  {
1673  // Parent Request from a MTD child means that the child had detached. It can be safely removed.
1674  RemoveNeighbor(*child);
1675  child = NULL;
1676  }
1677 
1678  if (child == NULL)
1679  {
1680  VerifyOrExit((child = NewChild()) != NULL, ;);
1681 
1682  memset(child, 0, sizeof(*child));
1683 
1684  // MAC Address
1685  memcpy(&child->mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(child->mMacAddr));
1686  child->mLinkInfo.Clear();
1687  child->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
1688  child->mLinkFailures = 0;
1689  child->mState = Neighbor::kStateParentRequest;
1690  child->mDataRequest = false;
1691 
1692  child->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
1693  child->mTimeout = Timer::MsecToSec(kMaxChildIdRequestTimeout);
1694  }
1695 
1696  SuccessOrExit(error = SendParentResponse(child, challenge, !scanMask.IsEndDeviceFlagSet()));
1697 
1698 exit:
1699  return error;
1700 }
1701 
1702 void MleRouter::HandleStateUpdateTimer(void *aContext)
1703 {
1704  static_cast<MleRouter *>(aContext)->HandleStateUpdateTimer();
1705 }
1706 
1707 void MleRouter::HandleStateUpdateTimer(void)
1708 {
1709  bool routerStateUpdate = false;
1710 
1711  if (mChallengeTimeout > 0)
1712  {
1713  mChallengeTimeout--;
1714  }
1715 
1716  if (mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout > 0)
1717  {
1718  mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout--;
1719 
1720  if (mRouterSelectionJitterTimeout == 0)
1721  {
1722  routerStateUpdate = true;
1723  }
1724  }
1725 
1726  switch (GetDeviceState())
1727  {
1728  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
1729  assert(false);
1730  break;
1731 
1732  case kDeviceStateDetached:
1733  SetStateDetached();
1734  BecomeChild(kMleAttachAnyPartition);
1735  ExitNow();
1736 
1737  case kDeviceStateChild:
1738  if (routerStateUpdate)
1739  {
1740  if (GetActiveRouterCount() < mRouterUpgradeThreshold)
1741  {
1742  // upgrade to Router
1743  BecomeRouter(ThreadStatusTlv::kTooFewRouters);
1744  }
1745  else if (!mAdvertiseTimer.IsRunning())
1746  {
1747  SendAdvertisement();
1748 
1749  mAdvertiseTimer.Start(
1750  Timer::SecToMsec(kReedAdvertiseInterval),
1751  Timer::SecToMsec(kReedAdvertiseInterval + kReedAdvertiseJitter),
1752  TrickleTimer::kModePlainTimer);
1753  }
1754 
1755  ExitNow();
1756  }
1757 
1758  // fall through
1759 
1760  case kDeviceStateRouter:
1761  // verify path to leader
1762  otLogDebgMle("network id timeout = %d", GetLeaderAge());
1763 
1764  if (GetLeaderAge() >= mNetworkIdTimeout)
1765  {
1766  BecomeChild(kMleAttachSamePartition1);
1767  }
1768 
1769  if (routerStateUpdate && GetActiveRouterCount() > mRouterDowngradeThreshold)
1770  {
1771  // downgrade to REED
1772  BecomeChild(kMleAttachSamePartition1);
1773  }
1774 
1775  break;
1776 
1777  case kDeviceStateLeader:
1778 
1779  // update router id sequence
1780  if (GetLeaderAge() >= kRouterIdSequencePeriod)
1781  {
1782  mRouterIdSequence++;
1783  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
1784  }
1785 
1786  break;
1787  }
1788 
1789  // update children state
1790  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1791  {
1792  uint32_t timeout = 0;
1793 
1794  switch (mChildren[i].mState)
1795  {
1796  case Neighbor::kStateInvalid:
1797  case Neighbor::kStateChildIdRequest:
1798  continue;
1799 
1800  case Neighbor::kStateParentRequest:
1801  case Neighbor::kStateValid:
1802  case Neighbor::kStateRestored:
1803  case Neighbor::kStateChildUpdateRequest:
1804  timeout = Timer::SecToMsec(mChildren[i].mTimeout);
1805  break;
1806 
1807  case Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest:
1808  assert(false);
1809  break;
1810  }
1811 
1812  if ((Timer::GetNow() - mChildren[i].mLastHeard) >= timeout)
1813  {
1814  RemoveNeighbor(mChildren[i]);
1815  }
1816  }
1817 
1818  // update router state
1819  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
1820  {
1821  if (mRouters[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
1822  {
1823  if ((Timer::GetNow() - mRouters[i].mLastHeard) >= Timer::SecToMsec(kMaxNeighborAge))
1824  {
1825  mRouters[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
1826  mRouters[i].mLinkInfo.Clear();
1827  mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut = 0;
1828  mRouters[i].mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
1829 
1830  for (uint8_t j = 0; j <= kMaxRouterId; j++)
1831  {
1832  if (mRouters[j].mNextHop == i)
1833  {
1834  mRouters[j].mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
1835  mRouters[j].mCost = 0;
1836 
1837  if (GetLinkCost(j) >= kMaxRouteCost)
1838  {
1839  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
1840  }
1841  }
1842  }
1843 
1844  if (mRouters[i].mNextHop == kInvalidRouterId)
1845  {
1846  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
1847  }
1848  }
1849  }
1850 
1851  if (GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateLeader)
1852  {
1853  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated)
1854  {
1855  if (!IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[i].mNextHop) &&
1856  GetLinkCost(i) >= kMaxRouteCost &&
1857  (Timer::GetNow() - mRouters[i].mLastHeard) >= Timer::SecToMsec(kMaxLeaderToRouterTimeout))
1858  {
1859  ReleaseRouterId(i);
1860  }
1861  }
1862  else if (mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay)
1863  {
1864  if ((Timer::GetNow() - mRouters[i].mLastHeard) >=
1865  Timer::SecToMsec((kMaxLeaderToRouterTimeout + kRouterIdReuseDelay)))
1866  {
1867  mRouters[i].mReclaimDelay = false;
1868  }
1869  }
1870  }
1871  }
1872 
1873  mStateUpdateTimer.Start(kStateUpdatePeriod);
1874 
1875 exit:
1876  {}
1877 }
1878 
1879 void MleRouter::HandleChildUpdateRequestTimer(void *aContext)
1880 {
1881  static_cast<MleRouter *>(aContext)->HandleChildUpdateRequestTimer();
1882 }
1883 
1884 void MleRouter::HandleChildUpdateRequestTimer(void)
1885 {
1886  VerifyOrExit(GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateRouter || GetDeviceState() == kDeviceStateLeader, ;);
1887 
1888  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
1889  {
1890  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateRestored)
1891  {
1892  SendChildUpdateRequest(&mChildren[i]);
1893  mChildren[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateChildUpdateRequest;
1894 
1895  if ((mChildren[i].mMode & ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle) != 0)
1896  {
1897  mChildren[i].mTimeout = Timer::MsecToSec(kMaxChildUpdateResponseTimeout);
1898  }
1899 
1900  mChildUpdateRequestTimer.Start(kChildUpdateRequestPeriod);
1901  break;
1902  }
1903  }
1904 
1905 exit:
1906  {}
1907 }
1908 
1909 ThreadError MleRouter::SendParentResponse(Child *aChild, const ChallengeTlv &challenge, bool aRoutersOnlyRequest)
1910 {
1911  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
1912  Ip6::Address destination;
1913  Message *message;
1914  uint16_t delay;
1915 
1916  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
1917  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandParentResponse));
1918  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
1919  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
1920  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLinkFrameCounter(*message));
1921  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendMleFrameCounter(*message));
1922  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendResponse(*message, challenge.GetChallenge(), challenge.GetLength()));
1923 
1924  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < sizeof(aChild->mAttachChallenge); i++)
1925  {
1926  aChild->mAttachChallenge[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
1927  }
1928 
1929  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChallenge(*message, aChild->mAttachChallenge, sizeof(aChild->mAttachChallenge)));
1930 
1931  if (isAssignLinkQuality &&
1932  (memcmp(mAddr64.m8, aChild->mMacAddr.m8, OT_EXT_ADDRESS_SIZE) == 0))
1933  {
1934  // use assigned one to ensure the link quality
1935  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLinkMargin(*message, mAssignLinkMargin));
1936  }
1937  else
1938  {
1939  error = AppendLinkMargin(*message, aChild->mLinkInfo.GetLinkMargin(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor()));
1940  SuccessOrExit(error);
1941  }
1942 
1943  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendConnectivity(*message));
1944  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendVersion(*message));
1945 
1946  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
1947  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xfe80);
1948  destination.SetIid(aChild->mMacAddr);
1949 
1950  if (aRoutersOnlyRequest)
1951  {
1952  delay = (otPlatRandomGet() % kParentResponseMaxDelayRouters) + 1;
1953  }
1954  else
1955  {
1956  delay = (otPlatRandomGet() % kParentResponseMaxDelayAll) + 1;
1957  }
1958 
1959  SuccessOrExit(error = AddDelayedResponse(*message, destination, delay));
1960 
1961  otLogInfoMle("Delayed Parent Response");
1962 
1963 exit:
1964 
1965  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
1966  {
1967  message->Free();
1968  }
1969 
1970  return kThreadError_None;
1971 }
1972 
1973 ThreadError MleRouter::UpdateChildAddresses(const AddressRegistrationTlv &aTlv, Child &aChild)
1974 {
1975  const AddressRegistrationEntry *entry;
1976  Lowpan::Context context;
1977 
1978  memset(aChild.mIp6Address, 0, sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address));
1979 
1980  for (uint8_t count = 0; count < sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address) / sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address[0]); count++)
1981  {
1982  if ((entry = aTlv.GetAddressEntry(count)) == NULL)
1983  {
1984  break;
1985  }
1986 
1987  if (entry->IsCompressed())
1988  {
1989  // xxx check if context id exists
1990  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetContext(entry->GetContextId(), context);
1991  memcpy(&aChild.mIp6Address[count], context.mPrefix, BitVectorBytes(context.mPrefixLength));
1992  aChild.mIp6Address[count].SetIid(entry->GetIid());
1993  }
1994  else
1995  {
1996  memcpy(&aChild.mIp6Address[count], entry->GetIp6Address(), sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address[count]));
1997  }
1998  }
1999 
2000  return kThreadError_None;
2001 }
2002 
2003 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleChildIdRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
2004  uint32_t aKeySequence)
2005 {
2006  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2007  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
2008  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
2009  ResponseTlv response;
2010  LinkFrameCounterTlv linkFrameCounter;
2011  MleFrameCounterTlv mleFrameCounter;
2012  ModeTlv mode;
2013  TimeoutTlv timeout;
2014  AddressRegistrationTlv address;
2015  TlvRequestTlv tlvRequest;
2016  ActiveTimestampTlv activeTimestamp;
2017  PendingTimestampTlv pendingTimestamp;
2018  Child *child;
2019  uint8_t numTlvs;
2020 
2021  otLogInfoMle("Received Child ID Request");
2022 
2023  // only process message when operating as a child, router, or leader
2024  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState >= kDeviceStateChild, error = kThreadError_InvalidState);
2025 
2026  // Find Child
2027  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
2028 
2029  VerifyOrExit((child = FindChild(macAddr)) != NULL, ;);
2030 
2031  // Response
2032  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kResponse, sizeof(response), response));
2033  VerifyOrExit(response.IsValid() &&
2034  memcmp(response.GetResponse(), child->mAttachChallenge, sizeof(child->mAttachChallenge)) == 0, ;);
2035 
2036  // Link-Layer Frame Counter
2037  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLinkFrameCounter, sizeof(linkFrameCounter),
2038  linkFrameCounter));
2039  VerifyOrExit(linkFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2040 
2041  // MLE Frame Counter
2042  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kMleFrameCounter, sizeof(mleFrameCounter), mleFrameCounter) ==
2043  kThreadError_None)
2044  {
2045  VerifyOrExit(mleFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2046  }
2047  else
2048  {
2049  mleFrameCounter.SetFrameCounter(linkFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter());
2050  }
2051 
2052  // Mode
2053  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kMode, sizeof(mode), mode));
2054  VerifyOrExit(mode.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2055 
2056  // Timeout
2057  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTimeout, sizeof(timeout), timeout));
2058  VerifyOrExit(timeout.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2059 
2060  // Ip6 Address
2061  address.SetLength(0);
2062 
2063  if ((mode.GetMode() & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) == 0)
2064  {
2065  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kAddressRegistration, sizeof(address), address));
2066  VerifyOrExit(address.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2067  }
2068 
2069  // TLV Request
2070  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTlvRequest, sizeof(tlvRequest), tlvRequest));
2071  VerifyOrExit(tlvRequest.IsValid() && tlvRequest.GetLength() <= sizeof(child->mRequestTlvs),
2072  error = kThreadError_Parse);
2073 
2074  // Active Timestamp
2075  activeTimestamp.SetLength(0);
2076 
2077  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kActiveTimestamp, sizeof(activeTimestamp), activeTimestamp) == kThreadError_None)
2078  {
2079  VerifyOrExit(activeTimestamp.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2080  }
2081 
2082  // Pending Timestamp
2083  pendingTimestamp.SetLength(0);
2084 
2085  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kPendingTimestamp, sizeof(pendingTimestamp), pendingTimestamp) == kThreadError_None)
2086  {
2087  VerifyOrExit(pendingTimestamp.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2088  }
2089 
2090  // Remove from router table
2091  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
2092  {
2093  if (mRouters[i].mState != Neighbor::kStateInvalid &&
2094  memcmp(&mRouters[i].mMacAddr, &macAddr, sizeof(mRouters[i].mMacAddr)) == 0)
2095  {
2096  RemoveNeighbor(mRouters[i]);
2097  break;
2098  }
2099  }
2100 
2101  if (child->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
2102  {
2103  child->mState = Neighbor::kStateChildIdRequest;
2104  }
2105  else
2106  {
2107  RemoveStoredChild(child->mValid.mRloc16);
2108 
2109  if (!(child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle))
2110  {
2111  mNetif.GetMeshForwarder().ClearChildIndirectMessages(*child);
2112  }
2113  }
2114 
2115 
2116  child->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
2117  child->mValid.mLinkFrameCounter = linkFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
2118  child->mValid.mMleFrameCounter = mleFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
2119  child->mKeySequence = aKeySequence;
2120  child->mMode = mode.GetMode();
2121  child->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
2122  child->mTimeout = timeout.GetTimeout();
2123 
2124  if (mode.GetMode() & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData)
2125  {
2126  child->mNetworkDataVersion = mLeaderData.GetDataVersion();
2127  }
2128  else
2129  {
2130  child->mNetworkDataVersion = mLeaderData.GetStableDataVersion();
2131  }
2132 
2133  UpdateChildAddresses(address, *child);
2134 
2135  memset(child->mRequestTlvs, Tlv::kInvalid, sizeof(child->mRequestTlvs));
2136  memcpy(child->mRequestTlvs, tlvRequest.GetTlvs(), tlvRequest.GetLength());
2137  numTlvs = tlvRequest.GetLength();
2138 
2139  if (activeTimestamp.GetLength() == 0 ||
2140  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp() == NULL ||
2141  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp()->Compare(activeTimestamp) != 0)
2142  {
2143  child->mRequestTlvs[numTlvs++] = Tlv::kActiveDataset;
2144  }
2145 
2146  if (pendingTimestamp.GetLength() == 0 ||
2147  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp() == NULL ||
2148  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp()->Compare(pendingTimestamp) != 0)
2149  {
2150  child->mRequestTlvs[numTlvs++] = Tlv::kPendingDataset;
2151  }
2152 
2153  switch (GetDeviceState())
2154  {
2155  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
2156  case kDeviceStateDetached:
2157  assert(false);
2158  break;
2159 
2160  case kDeviceStateChild:
2161  child->mState = Neighbor::kStateChildIdRequest;
2162  BecomeRouter(ThreadStatusTlv::kHaveChildIdRequest);
2163  break;
2164 
2165  case kDeviceStateRouter:
2166  case kDeviceStateLeader:
2167  SuccessOrExit(error = SendChildIdResponse(child));
2168  break;
2169  }
2170 
2171 exit:
2172  return error;
2173 }

2175 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleChildUpdateRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
2176 {
2177  static const uint8_t kMaxResponseTlvs = 10;
2178 
2179  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2180  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
2181  ModeTlv mode;
2182  ChallengeTlv challenge;
2183  AddressRegistrationTlv address;
2184  LeaderDataTlv leaderData;
2185  TimeoutTlv timeout;
2186  Child *child;
2187  uint8_t tlvs[kMaxResponseTlvs];
2188  uint8_t tlvslength = 0;
2189 
2190  otLogInfoMle("Received Child Update Request from child");
2191 
2192  // Find Child
2193  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
2194 
2195  child = FindChild(macAddr);
2196 
2197  if ((child == NULL) || (child->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid))
2198  {
2199  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kStatus;
2200  SendChildUpdateResponse(NULL, aMessageInfo, tlvs, tlvslength, NULL);
2201  ExitNow();
2202  }
2203 
2204  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kSourceAddress;
2205  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kLeaderData;
2206 
2207  // Mode
2208  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kMode, sizeof(mode), mode));
2209  VerifyOrExit(mode.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2210  child->mMode = mode.GetMode();
2211  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kMode;
2212 
2213  // Challenge
2214  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kChallenge, sizeof(challenge), challenge) == kThreadError_None)
2215  {
2216  VerifyOrExit(challenge.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2217  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kResponse;
2218  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kMleFrameCounter;
2219  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kLinkFrameCounter;
2220  }
2221 
2222  // Ip6 Address TLV
2223  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kAddressRegistration, sizeof(address), address) == kThreadError_None)
2224  {
2225  VerifyOrExit(address.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2226  UpdateChildAddresses(address, *child);
2227  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kAddressRegistration;
2228  }
2229 
2230  // Leader Data
2231  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData) == kThreadError_None)
2232  {
2233  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2234 
2235  if (child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData)
2236  {
2237  // full network data
2238  child->mNetworkDataVersion = leaderData.GetDataVersion();
2239 
2240  if (leaderData.GetDataVersion() != mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetVersion())
2241  {
2242  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kNetworkData;
2243  }
2244  }
2245  else
2246  {
2247  // stable network data
2248  child->mNetworkDataVersion = leaderData.GetStableDataVersion();
2249 
2250  if (leaderData.GetStableDataVersion() != mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetStableVersion())
2251  {
2252  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kNetworkData;
2253  }
2254  }
2255  }
2256  else
2257  {
2258  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kNetworkData;
2259  }
2260 
2261  // Timeout
2262  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTimeout, sizeof(timeout), timeout) == kThreadError_None)
2263  {
2264  VerifyOrExit(timeout.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2265  child->mTimeout = timeout.GetTimeout();
2266  tlvs[tlvslength++] = Tlv::kTimeout;
2267  }
2268 
2269  child->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
2270  child->mAddSrcMatchEntryShort = true;
2271 
2272  SendChildUpdateResponse(child, aMessageInfo, tlvs, tlvslength, &challenge);
2273 
2274 exit:
2275  return error;
2276 }

2278 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleChildUpdateResponse(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
2279  uint32_t aKeySequence)
2280 {
2281  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2282  const ThreadMessageInfo *threadMessageInfo = static_cast<const ThreadMessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo.GetLinkInfo());
2283  Mac::ExtAddress macAddr;
2284  SourceAddressTlv sourceAddress;
2285  TimeoutTlv timeout;
2286  AddressRegistrationTlv address;
2287  ResponseTlv response;
2288  LinkFrameCounterTlv linkFrameCounter;
2289  MleFrameCounterTlv mleFrameCounter;
2290  LeaderDataTlv leaderData;
2291  Child *child;
2292 
2293  otLogInfoMle("Received Child Update Response from child");
2294 
2295  // Find Child
2296  macAddr.Set(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr());
2297 
2298  VerifyOrExit((child = FindChild(macAddr)) != NULL, error = kThreadError_NotFound);
2299 
2300  // Source Address
2301  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kSourceAddress, sizeof(sourceAddress), sourceAddress) == kThreadError_None)
2302  {
2303  VerifyOrExit(sourceAddress.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2304  VerifyOrExit(child->mValid.mRloc16 == sourceAddress.GetRloc16(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2305  }
2306 
2307  // Response
2308  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kResponse, sizeof(response), response) == kThreadError_None)
2309  {
2310  VerifyOrExit(response.IsValid() &&
2311  memcmp(response.GetResponse(), child->mPending.mChallenge, sizeof(child->mPending.mChallenge)) == 0, ;);
2312  }
2313 
2314  // Link-Layer Frame Counter
2315  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLinkFrameCounter, sizeof(linkFrameCounter), linkFrameCounter) == kThreadError_None)
2316  {
2317  VerifyOrExit(linkFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2318  child->mValid.mLinkFrameCounter = linkFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
2319  }
2320 
2321  // MLE Frame Counter
2322  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kMleFrameCounter, sizeof(mleFrameCounter), mleFrameCounter) == kThreadError_None)
2323  {
2324  VerifyOrExit(mleFrameCounter.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2325  child->mValid.mMleFrameCounter = mleFrameCounter.GetFrameCounter();
2326  }
2327 
2328  // Timeout
2329  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTimeout, sizeof(timeout), timeout) == kThreadError_None)
2330  {
2331  VerifyOrExit(timeout.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2332  child->mTimeout = timeout.GetTimeout();
2333  }
2334 
2335  // Ip6 Address
2336  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kAddressRegistration, sizeof(address), address) == kThreadError_None)
2337  {
2338  VerifyOrExit(address.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2339  UpdateChildAddresses(address, *child);
2340  }
2341 
2342  // Leader Data
2343  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kLeaderData, sizeof(leaderData), leaderData) == kThreadError_None)
2344  {
2345  VerifyOrExit(leaderData.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2346 
2347  if (child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData)
2348  {
2349  child->mNetworkDataVersion = leaderData.GetDataVersion();
2350  }
2351  else
2352  {
2353  child->mNetworkDataVersion = leaderData.GetStableDataVersion();
2354  }
2355  }
2356 
2357  SetChildStateToValid(child);
2358  child->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
2359  child->mKeySequence = aKeySequence;
2360  child->mLinkInfo.AddRss(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor(), threadMessageInfo->mRss);
2361  child->mAddSrcMatchEntryShort = true;
2362 
2363 exit:
2364  return error;
2365 }
