2367 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleDataRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
2368 {
2369  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2370  TlvRequestTlv tlvRequest;
2371  ActiveTimestampTlv activeTimestamp;
2372  PendingTimestampTlv pendingTimestamp;
2373  uint8_t tlvs[4];
2374  uint8_t numTlvs;
2375 
2376  otLogInfoMle("Received Data Request");
2377 
2378  // TLV Request
2379  SuccessOrExit(error = Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kTlvRequest, sizeof(tlvRequest), tlvRequest));
2380  VerifyOrExit(tlvRequest.IsValid() && tlvRequest.GetLength() <= sizeof(tlvs), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2381 
2382  // Active Timestamp
2383  activeTimestamp.SetLength(0);
2384 
2385  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kActiveTimestamp, sizeof(activeTimestamp), activeTimestamp) == kThreadError_None)
2386  {
2387  VerifyOrExit(activeTimestamp.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2388  }
2389 
2390  // Pending Timestamp
2391  pendingTimestamp.SetLength(0);
2392 
2393  if (Tlv::GetTlv(aMessage, Tlv::kPendingTimestamp, sizeof(pendingTimestamp), pendingTimestamp) == kThreadError_None)
2394  {
2395  VerifyOrExit(pendingTimestamp.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2396  }
2397 
2398  memset(tlvs, Tlv::kInvalid, sizeof(tlvs));
2399  memcpy(tlvs, tlvRequest.GetTlvs(), tlvRequest.GetLength());
2400  numTlvs = tlvRequest.GetLength();
2401 
2402  if (activeTimestamp.GetLength() == 0 ||
2403  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp() == NULL ||
2404  mNetif.GetActiveDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp()->Compare(activeTimestamp) != 0)
2405  {
2406  tlvs[numTlvs++] = Tlv::kActiveDataset;
2407  }
2408 
2409  if (pendingTimestamp.GetLength() == 0 ||
2410  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp() == NULL ||
2411  mNetif.GetPendingDataset().GetNetwork().GetTimestamp()->Compare(pendingTimestamp) != 0)
2412  {
2413  tlvs[numTlvs++] = Tlv::kPendingDataset;
2414  }
2415 
2416  SendDataResponse(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr(), tlvs, numTlvs, 0);
2417 
2418 exit:
2419  return error;
2420 }
2421 
2422 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleNetworkDataUpdateRouter(void)
2423 {
2424  static const uint8_t tlvs[] = {Tlv::kNetworkData};
2425  Ip6::Address destination;
2426  uint16_t delay;
2427 
2428  VerifyOrExit(mDeviceState == kDeviceStateRouter || mDeviceState == kDeviceStateLeader, ;);
2429 
2430  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
2431  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xff02);
2432  destination.mFields.m16[7] = HostSwap16(0x0001);
2433 
2434  delay = (mDeviceState == kDeviceStateLeader) ? 0 : (otPlatRandomGet() % kUnsolicitedDataResponseJitter);
2435  SendDataResponse(destination, tlvs, sizeof(tlvs), delay);
2436 
2437  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
2438  {
2439  Child *child = &mChildren[i];
2440 
2441  if (child->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid || (child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle) != 0)
2442  {
2443  continue;
2444  }
2445 
2446  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
2447  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xfe80);
2448  destination.SetIid(child->mMacAddr);
2449 
2450  if (child->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData)
2451  {
2452  if (child->mNetworkDataVersion != mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetVersion())
2453  {
2454  SendDataResponse(destination, tlvs, sizeof(tlvs), 0);
2455  }
2456  }
2457  else
2458  {
2459  if (child->mNetworkDataVersion != mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetStableVersion())
2460  {
2461  static const uint8_t responseTlvs[] = {Tlv::kNetworkData, Tlv::kActiveDataset, Tlv::kPendingDataset};
2462 
2463  SendDataResponse(destination, responseTlvs, sizeof(responseTlvs), 0);
2464  }
2465  }
2466  }
2467 
2468 exit:
2469  return kThreadError_None;
2470 }
2471 
2472 ThreadError MleRouter::HandleDiscoveryRequest(const Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
2473 {
2474  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2475  Tlv tlv;
2476  MeshCoP::Tlv meshcopTlv;
2477  MeshCoP::DiscoveryRequestTlv discoveryRequest;
2478  MeshCoP::ExtendedPanIdTlv extPanId;
2479  uint16_t offset;
2480  uint16_t end;
2481 
2482  otLogInfoMle("Received discovery request");
2483 
2484  // only Routers and REEDs respond
2485  VerifyOrExit((mDeviceMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) != 0, ;);
2486 
2487  offset = aMessage.GetOffset();
2488  end = aMessage.GetLength();
2489 
2490  // find MLE Discovery TLV
2491  while (offset < end)
2492  {
2493  aMessage.Read(offset, sizeof(tlv), &tlv);
2494 
2495  if (tlv.GetType() == Tlv::kDiscovery)
2496  {
2497  break;
2498  }
2499 
2500  offset += sizeof(tlv) + tlv.GetLength();
2501  }
2502 
2503  VerifyOrExit(offset < end, error = kThreadError_Parse);
2504 
2505  offset += sizeof(tlv);
2506  end = offset + sizeof(tlv) + tlv.GetLength();
2507 
2508  while (offset < end)
2509  {
2510  aMessage.Read(offset, sizeof(meshcopTlv), &meshcopTlv);
2511 
2512  switch (meshcopTlv.GetType())
2513  {
2514  case MeshCoP::Tlv::kDiscoveryRequest:
2515  aMessage.Read(offset, sizeof(discoveryRequest), &discoveryRequest);
2516  VerifyOrExit(discoveryRequest.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2517  break;
2518 
2519  case MeshCoP::Tlv::kExtendedPanId:
2520  aMessage.Read(offset, sizeof(extPanId), &extPanId);
2521  VerifyOrExit(extPanId.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
2522  VerifyOrExit(memcmp(mNetif.GetMac().GetExtendedPanId(), extPanId.GetExtendedPanId(), OT_EXT_PAN_ID_SIZE),
2523  error = kThreadError_Drop);
2524  break;
2525 
2526  default:
2527  break;
2528  }
2529 
2530  offset += sizeof(meshcopTlv) + meshcopTlv.GetLength();
2531  }
2532 
2533  error = SendDiscoveryResponse(aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr(), aMessage.GetPanId());
2534 
2535 exit:
2536 
2537  if (error != kThreadError_None)
2538  {
2539  otLogWarnMleErr(error, "Failed to process Discovery Request");
2540  }
2541 
2542  return error;
2543 }
2544 
2545 ThreadError MleRouter::SendDiscoveryResponse(const Ip6::Address &aDestination, uint16_t aPanId)
2546 {
2547  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2548  Message *message;
2549  uint16_t startOffset;
2550  Tlv tlv;
2551  MeshCoP::DiscoveryResponseTlv discoveryResponse;
2552  MeshCoP::ExtendedPanIdTlv extPanId;
2553  MeshCoP::NetworkNameTlv networkName;
2554  MeshCoP::JoinerUdpPortTlv joinerUdpPort;
2555  MeshCoP::Tlv *steeringData;
2556  uint16_t delay;
2557 
2558  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
2559  message->SetSubType(Message::kSubTypeMleDiscoverResponse);
2560  message->SetPanId(aPanId);
2561  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandDiscoveryResponse));
2562 
2563  // Discovery TLV
2564  tlv.SetType(Tlv::kDiscovery);
2565  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&tlv, sizeof(tlv)));
2566 
2567  startOffset = message->GetLength();
2568 
2569  // Discovery Response TLV
2570  discoveryResponse.Init();
2571  discoveryResponse.SetVersion(kVersion);
2572 
2573  if (mNetif.GetKeyManager().GetSecurityPolicyFlags() & OT_SECURITY_POLICY_NATIVE_COMMISSIONING)
2574  {
2575  discoveryResponse.SetNativeCommissioner(true);
2576  }
2577  else
2578  {
2579  discoveryResponse.SetNativeCommissioner(false);
2580  }
2581 
2582  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&discoveryResponse, sizeof(discoveryResponse)));
2583 
2584  // Extended PAN ID TLV
2585  extPanId.Init();
2586  extPanId.SetExtendedPanId(mNetif.GetMac().GetExtendedPanId());
2587  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&extPanId, sizeof(extPanId)));
2588 
2589  // Network Name TLV
2590  networkName.Init();
2591  networkName.SetNetworkName(mNetif.GetMac().GetNetworkName());
2592  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&networkName, sizeof(tlv) + networkName.GetLength()));
2593 
2594  // Steering Data TLV
2595  steeringData = mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetCommissioningDataSubTlv(MeshCoP::Tlv::kSteeringData);
2596 
2597  if (steeringData != NULL)
2598  {
2599  SuccessOrExit(message->Append(steeringData, sizeof(*steeringData) + steeringData->GetLength()));
2600  }
2601 
2602  // Joiner UDP Port TLV
2603  joinerUdpPort.Init();
2604  joinerUdpPort.SetUdpPort(mNetif.GetJoinerRouter().GetJoinerUdpPort());
2605  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&joinerUdpPort, sizeof(tlv) + joinerUdpPort.GetLength()));
2606 
2607  tlv.SetLength(static_cast<uint8_t>(message->GetLength() - startOffset));
2608  message->Write(startOffset - sizeof(tlv), sizeof(tlv), &tlv);
2609 
2610  delay = otPlatRandomGet() % (kDiscoveryMaxJitter + 1);
2611 
2612  SuccessOrExit(error = AddDelayedResponse(*message, aDestination, delay));
2613 
2614  otLogInfoMle("Sent discovery response");
2615 
2616 exit:
2617 
2618  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
2619  {
2620  message->Free();
2621  }
2622 
2623  return error;
2624 }
2625 
2626 ThreadError MleRouter::SendChildIdResponse(Child *aChild)
2627 {
2628  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2629  Ip6::Address destination;
2630  Message *message;
2631 
2632  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
2633  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandChildIdResponse));
2634  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
2635  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
2636  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendActiveTimestamp(*message, false));
2637  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingTimestamp(*message));
2638 
2639  if (aChild->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
2640  {
2641  // pick next Child ID that is not being used
2642  do
2643  {
2644  mNextChildId++;
2645 
2646  if (mNextChildId > kMaxChildId)
2647  {
2648  mNextChildId = kMinChildId;
2649  }
2650  }
2651  while (FindChild(mNextChildId) != NULL);
2652 
2653  // allocate Child ID
2654  aChild->mValid.mRloc16 = mNetif.GetMac().GetShortAddress() | mNextChildId;
2655  }
2656 
2657  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendAddress16(*message, aChild->mValid.mRloc16));
2658 
2659  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < sizeof(aChild->mRequestTlvs); i++)
2660  {
2661  switch (aChild->mRequestTlvs[i])
2662  {
2663  case Tlv::kNetworkData:
2664  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendNetworkData(*message, (aChild->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData) == 0));
2665  break;
2666 
2667  case Tlv::kRoute:
2668  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendRoute(*message));
2669  break;
2670 
2671  case Tlv::kActiveDataset:
2672  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendActiveDataset(*message));
2673  break;
2674 
2675  case Tlv::kPendingDataset:
2676  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingDataset(*message));
2677  break;
2678 
2679  default:
2680  break;
2681  }
2682  }
2683 
2684  if ((aChild->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) == 0)
2685  {
2686  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChildAddresses(*message, *aChild));
2687  }
2688 
2689  SetChildStateToValid(aChild);
2690 
2691  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
2692  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xfe80);
2693  destination.SetIid(aChild->mMacAddr);
2694  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, destination));
2695 
2696  otLogInfoMle("Sent Child ID Response");
2697 
2698 exit:
2699 
2700  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
2701  {
2702  message->Free();
2703  }
2704 
2705  return kThreadError_None;
2706 }

2708 ThreadError MleRouter::SendChildUpdateRequest(Child *aChild)
2709 {
2710  static const uint8_t tlvs[] = {Tlv::kTimeout, Tlv::kAddressRegistration};
2711  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2712  Ip6::Address destination;
2713  Message *message;
2714 
2715  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
2716  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandChildUpdateRequest));
2717  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
2718  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
2719  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendNetworkData(*message, (aChild->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData) == 0));
2720  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendActiveTimestamp(*message, false));
2721  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingTimestamp(*message));
2722  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendTlvRequest(*message, tlvs, sizeof(tlvs)));
2723

2726  aChild->mPending.mChallenge[i] = static_cast<uint8_t>(otPlatRandomGet());
2727  }
2728 
2729  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendChallenge(*message, aChild->mPending.mChallenge,
2730  sizeof(aChild->mPending.mChallenge)));
2731 
2732  memset(&destination, 0, sizeof(destination));
2733  destination.mFields.m16[0] = HostSwap16(0xfe80);
2734  destination.SetIid(aChild->mMacAddr);
2735  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, destination));
2736 
2737  otLogInfoMle("Sent Child Update Request to child");
2738 
2739 exit:
2740 
2741  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
2742  {
2743  message->Free();
2744  }
2745 
2746  return error;

2749 ThreadError MleRouter::SendChildUpdateResponse(Child *aChild, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo,
2750  const uint8_t *aTlvs, uint8_t aTlvslength,
2751  const ChallengeTlv *aChallenge)
2752 {

2765  break;

2782  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingTimestamp(*message));
2783  break;

2787  break;

2790  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
2791  break;

2795  break;

2799  break;
2800 
2801  case Tlv::kLinkFrameCounter:
2802  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLinkFrameCounter(*message));
2803  break;
2804  }
2805  }
2806 
2807  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, aMessageInfo.GetPeerAddr()));
2808

2810 
2811 exit:
2812 
2813  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
2814  {
2815  message->Free();
2816  }
2817 
2818  return kThreadError_None;

2821 ThreadError MleRouter::SendDataResponse(const Ip6::Address &aDestination, const uint8_t *aTlvs, uint8_t aTlvsLength,
2822  uint16_t aDelay)
2823 {
2824  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
2825  Message *message;
2826  Neighbor *neighbor;
2827  bool stableOnly;
2828 
2829  VerifyOrExit((message = NewMleMessage()) != NULL, ;);
2830  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendHeader(*message, Header::kCommandDataResponse));
2831  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendSourceAddress(*message));
2832  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendLeaderData(*message));
2833  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendActiveTimestamp(*message, false));
2834  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingTimestamp(*message));
2835 
2836  for (int i = 0; i < aTlvsLength; i++)
2837  {
2838  switch (aTlvs[i])
2839  {
2840  case Tlv::kNetworkData:
2841  neighbor = GetNeighbor(aDestination);
2842  stableOnly = neighbor != NULL ? (neighbor->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData) == 0 : false;
2843  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendNetworkData(*message, stableOnly));
2844  break;
2845 
2846  case Tlv::kActiveDataset:
2847  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendActiveDataset(*message));
2848  break;
2849 
2850  case Tlv::kPendingDataset:
2851  SuccessOrExit(error = AppendPendingDataset(*message));
2852  break;
2853  }
2854  }
2855 
2856  if (aDelay)
2857  {
2858  SuccessOrExit(error = AddDelayedResponse(*message, aDestination, aDelay));
2859  }
2860  else
2861  {
2862  SuccessOrExit(error = SendMessage(*message, aDestination));
2863  }
2864 
2865  otLogInfoMle("Sent Data Response");
2866 
2867 exit:
2868 
2869  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
2870  {
2871  message->Free();
2872  }
2873 
2874  return error;
2875 }

2962 ThreadError MleRouter::RemoveNeighbor(Neighbor &aNeighbor)
2963 {
2964  switch (mDeviceState)
2965  {
2966  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
2967  case kDeviceStateDetached:
2968  break;
2969 
2970  case kDeviceStateChild:
2971  if (&aNeighbor == &mParent)
2972  {
2973  BecomeDetached();
2974  }
2975 
2976  break;
2977 
2978  case kDeviceStateRouter:
2979  case kDeviceStateLeader:
2980  if (aNeighbor.IsStateValidOrRestoring() && !IsActiveRouter(aNeighbor.mValid.mRloc16))
2981  {
2982  aNeighbor.mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
2983  mNetif.GetMeshForwarder().UpdateIndirectMessages();
2984  mNetif.SetStateChangedFlags(OT_THREAD_CHILD_REMOVED);
2985  mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().SendServerDataNotification(aNeighbor.mValid.mRloc16);
2986  RemoveStoredChild(aNeighbor.mValid.mRloc16);
2987  }
2988 
2989  break;
2990  }
2991 
2992  aNeighbor.mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
2993 
2994  return kThreadError_None;
2995 }

3108 Neighbor *MleRouter::GetNeighbor(const Ip6::Address &aAddress)
3109 {
3110  Mac::Address macaddr;
3111  Lowpan::Context context;
3112  Child *child;
3113  Router *router;
3114  Neighbor *rval = NULL;
3115 
3116  if (aAddress.IsLinkLocal())
3117  {
3118  if (aAddress.mFields.m16[4] == HostSwap16(0x0000) &&
3119  aAddress.mFields.m16[5] == HostSwap16(0x00ff) &&
3120  aAddress.mFields.m16[6] == HostSwap16(0xfe00))
3121  {
3122  macaddr.mLength = sizeof(macaddr.mShortAddress);
3123  macaddr.mShortAddress = HostSwap16(aAddress.mFields.m16[7]);
3124  }
3125  else
3126  {
3127  macaddr.mLength = sizeof(macaddr.mExtAddress);
3128  macaddr.mExtAddress.Set(aAddress);
3129  }
3130 
3131  ExitNow(rval = GetNeighbor(macaddr));
3132  }
3133 
3134  if (mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetContext(aAddress, context) != kThreadError_None)
3135  {
3136  context.mContextId = 0xff;
3137  }
3138 
3139  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
3140  {
3141  child = &mChildren[i];
3142 
3143  if (!child->IsStateValidOrRestoring())
3144  {
3145  continue;
3146  }
3147 
3148  if (context.mContextId == 0 &&
3149  aAddress.mFields.m16[4] == HostSwap16(0x0000) &&
3150  aAddress.mFields.m16[5] == HostSwap16(0x00ff) &&
3151  aAddress.mFields.m16[6] == HostSwap16(0xfe00) &&
3152  aAddress.mFields.m16[7] == HostSwap16(child->mValid.mRloc16))
3153  {
3154  ExitNow(rval = child);
3155  }
3156 
3157  for (int j = 0; j < Child::kMaxIp6AddressPerChild; j++)
3158  {
3159  if (memcmp(&child->mIp6Address[j], aAddress.mFields.m8, sizeof(child->mIp6Address[j])) == 0)
3160  {
3161  ExitNow(rval = child);
3162  }
3163  }
3164  }
3165 
3166  VerifyOrExit(context.mContextId == 0, rval = NULL);
3167 
3168  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
3169  {
3170  router = &mRouters[i];
3171 
3172  if (router->mState != Neighbor::kStateValid)
3173  {
3174  continue;
3175  }
3176 
3177  if (aAddress.mFields.m16[4] == HostSwap16(0x0000) &&
3178  aAddress.mFields.m16[5] == HostSwap16(0x00ff) &&
3179  aAddress.mFields.m16[6] == HostSwap16(0xfe00) &&
3180  aAddress.mFields.m16[7] == HostSwap16(router->mValid.mRloc16))
3181  {
3182  ExitNow(rval = router);
3183  }
3184  }
3185 
3186 exit:
3187  return rval;
3188 }

3190 uint16_t MleRouter::GetNextHop(uint16_t aDestination)
3191 {
3192  uint8_t destinationId = GetRouterId(aDestination);
3193  uint8_t routeCost;
3194  uint8_t linkCost;
3195  uint16_t rval = Mac::kShortAddrInvalid;
3196  const Router *router;
3197  const Router *nextHop;
3198 
3199  if (mDeviceState == kDeviceStateChild)
3200  {
3201  ExitNow(rval = Mle::GetNextHop(aDestination));
3202  }
3203 
3204  // The frame is destined to a child
3205  if (destinationId == mRouterId)
3206  {
3207  ExitNow(rval = aDestination);
3208  }
3209 
3210  router = GetRouter(destinationId);
3211  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL,);
3212 
3213  linkCost = GetLinkCost(destinationId);
3214  routeCost = GetRouteCost(aDestination);
3215 
3216  if ((routeCost + GetLinkCost(router->mNextHop)) < linkCost)
3217  {
3218  nextHop = GetRouter(router->mNextHop);
3219  VerifyOrExit(nextHop != NULL && nextHop->mState != Neighbor::kStateInvalid,);
3220 
3221  rval = GetRloc16(router->mNextHop);
3222  }
3223  else if (linkCost < kMaxRouteCost)
3224  {
3225  rval = GetRloc16(destinationId);
3226  }
3227 
3228 exit:
3229  return rval;
3230 }

3235  const Router *router;
3236 
3237  router = GetRouter(GetRouterId(aRloc16));
3238  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL && GetRouter(router->mNextHop) != NULL,);
3239 
3240  rval = router->mCost;
3241 
3242 exit:
3243  return rval;

3365 {
3366  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
3367 
3368  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < kMaxChildren; i++)
3369  {
3370  Child *child;
3371  otChildInfo childInfo;
3372  uint16_t length;
3373 
3374  length = sizeof(childInfo);
3375  SuccessOrExit(otPlatSettingsGet(mNetif.GetInstance(), kKeyChildInfo, i,
3376  reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(&childInfo), &length));
3377  VerifyOrExit(length == sizeof(childInfo), ;);
3378 
3379  VerifyOrExit((child = NewChild()) != NULL, error = kThreadError_NoBufs);
3380  memset(child, 0, sizeof(*child));
3381 
3382  memcpy(&child->mMacAddr, &childInfo.mExtAddress, sizeof(child->mMacAddr));
3383  child->mValid.mRloc16 = childInfo.mRloc16;
3384  child->mTimeout = childInfo.mTimeout;
3385  child->mMode = (childInfo.mRxOnWhenIdle ? ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle : 0) |
3386  (childInfo.mSecureDataRequest ? ModeTlv::kModeSecureDataRequest : 0) |
3387  (childInfo.mFullFunction ? ModeTlv::kModeFFD : 0) |
3388  (childInfo.mFullNetworkData ? ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData : 0);
3389  child->mState = Neighbor::kStateRestored;
3390  child->mLastHeard = Timer::GetNow();
3391  }
3392 
3393 exit:
3394  return error;
3395 }

3398 {
3399  ThreadError error = kThreadError_NotFound;
3400 
3401  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < kMaxChildren; i++)
3402  {
3403  otChildInfo childInfo;
3404  uint16_t length = sizeof(childInfo);
3405 
3406  SuccessOrExit(otPlatSettingsGet(mNetif.GetInstance(), kKeyChildInfo, i,
3407  reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(&childInfo), &length));
3408  VerifyOrExit(length == sizeof(childInfo), ;);
3409 
3410  if (childInfo.mRloc16 == aChildRloc16)
3411  {
3412  error = otPlatSettingsDelete(mNetif.GetInstance(), kKeyChildInfo, i);
3413  ExitNow();
3414  }

3462 ThreadError MleRouter::GetRouterInfo(uint16_t aRouterId, otRouterInfo &aRouterInfo)
3463 {

3465  Router *router;
3466  uint8_t routerId;
3467 
3468  if (aRouterId > kMaxRouterId && IsActiveRouter(aRouterId))
3469  {
3470  routerId = GetRouterId(aRouterId);
3471  }
3472  else
3473  {
3474  routerId = static_cast<uint8_t>(aRouterId);
3475  }
3476 
3477  router = GetRouter(routerId);

3481  aRouterInfo.mAllocated = router->mAllocated;

3484  aRouterInfo.mNextHop = router->mNextHop;
3485  aRouterInfo.mLinkEstablished = router->mState == Neighbor::kStateValid;
3486  aRouterInfo.mPathCost = router->mCost;
3487  aRouterInfo.mLinkQualityIn = router->mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor());
3488  aRouterInfo.mLinkQualityOut = router->mLinkQualityOut;
3489  aRouterInfo.mAge = static_cast<uint8_t>(Timer::MsecToSec(Timer::GetNow() - router->mLastHeard));

3495 ThreadError MleRouter::GetNextNeighborInfo(otNeighborInfoIterator &aIterator, otNeighborInfo &aNeighInfo)
3496 {
3497  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
3498  Neighbor *neighbor = NULL;
3499  int16_t index;
3500 
3501  memset(&aNeighInfo, 0, sizeof(aNeighInfo));
3502 
3503  // Non-negative iterator value gives the current index into mChildren array
3504 
3505  if (aIterator >= 0)
3506  {
3507  for (index = aIterator; index < mMaxChildrenAllowed; index++)
3508  {
3509  if (mChildren[index].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
3510  {
3511  neighbor = &mChildren[index];
3512  aNeighInfo.mIsChild = true;
3513  index++;
3514  aIterator = index;
3515  ExitNow();
3516  }
3517  }
3518 
3519  aIterator = 0;
3520  }
3521 
3522  // Negative iterator value gives the current index into mRouters array
3523 
3524  for (index = -aIterator; index <= kMaxRouterId; index++)
3525  {
3526  if (mRouters[index].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
3527  {
3528  neighbor = &mRouters[index];
3529  aNeighInfo.mIsChild = false;
3530  index++;
3531  aIterator = -index;
3532  ExitNow();
3533  }
3534  }
3535 
3536  aIterator = -index;
3537  error = kThreadError_NotFound;
3538 
3539 exit:
3540 
3541  if (neighbor != NULL)
3542  {
3543  memcpy(&aNeighInfo.mExtAddress, &neighbor->mMacAddr, sizeof(aNeighInfo.mExtAddress));
3544  aNeighInfo.mAge = Timer::MsecToSec(Timer::GetNow() - neighbor->mLastHeard);
3545  aNeighInfo.mRloc16 = neighbor->mValid.mRloc16;
3546  aNeighInfo.mLinkFrameCounter = neighbor->mValid.mLinkFrameCounter;
3547  aNeighInfo.mMleFrameCounter = neighbor->mValid.mMleFrameCounter;
3548  aNeighInfo.mLinkQualityIn = neighbor->mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor());
3549  aNeighInfo.mAverageRssi = neighbor->mLinkInfo.GetAverageRss();
3550  aNeighInfo.mRxOnWhenIdle = (neighbor->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeRxOnWhenIdle) != 0;
3551  aNeighInfo.mSecureDataRequest = (neighbor->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeSecureDataRequest) != 0;
3552  aNeighInfo.mFullFunction = (neighbor->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFFD) != 0;
3553  aNeighInfo.mFullNetworkData = (neighbor->mMode & ModeTlv::kModeFullNetworkData) != 0;
3554  }
3555 
3556  return error;
3557 }

3559 void MleRouter::ResolveRoutingLoops(uint16_t aSourceMac, uint16_t aDestRloc16)
3560 {
3561  if (aSourceMac == GetNextHop(aDestRloc16))
3562  {
3563  // loop detected
3564  Router *router = GetRouter(GetRouterId(aDestRloc16));
3565  assert(router != NULL);
3566 
3567  // invalidate next hop
3568  router->mNextHop = kInvalidRouterId;
3569  ResetAdvertiseInterval();
3570  }
3571 }

3573 ThreadError MleRouter::CheckReachability(uint16_t aMeshSource, uint16_t aMeshDest, Ip6::Header &aIp6Header)
3574 {
3575  Ip6::MessageInfo messageInfo;
3576 
3577  if (mDeviceState == kDeviceStateChild)
3578  {
3579  return Mle::CheckReachability(aMeshSource, aMeshDest, aIp6Header);
3580  }
3581 
3582  if (aMeshDest == mNetif.GetMac().GetShortAddress())
3583  {
3584  // mesh destination is this device
3585  if (mNetif.IsUnicastAddress(aIp6Header.GetDestination()))
3586  {
3587  // IPv6 destination is this device
3588  return kThreadError_None;
3589  }
3590  else if (GetNeighbor(aIp6Header.GetDestination()) != NULL)
3591  {
3592  // IPv6 destination is an RFD child
3593  return kThreadError_None;
3594  }
3595  }
3596  else if (GetRouterId(aMeshDest) == mRouterId)
3597  {
3598  // mesh destination is a child of this device
3599  if (GetChild(aMeshDest))
3600  {
3601  return kThreadError_None;
3602  }
3603  }
3604  else if (GetNextHop(aMeshDest) != Mac::kShortAddrInvalid)
3605  {
3606  // forwarding to another router and route is known
3607  return kThreadError_None;
3608  }
3609 
3610  messageInfo.GetPeerAddr() = GetMeshLocal16();
3611  messageInfo.GetPeerAddr().mFields.m16[7] = HostSwap16(aMeshSource);
3612  messageInfo.SetInterfaceId(mNetif.GetInterfaceId());
3613 
3614  mNetif.GetIp6().mIcmp.SendError(Ip6::IcmpHeader::kTypeDstUnreach,
3615  Ip6::IcmpHeader::kCodeDstUnreachNoRoute,
3616  messageInfo, aIp6Header);
3617 
3618  return kThreadError_Drop;
3619 }

3621 ThreadError MleRouter::SendAddressSolicit(ThreadStatusTlv::Status aStatus)
3622 {
3623  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
3624  Coap::Header header;
3625  ThreadExtMacAddressTlv macAddr64Tlv;
3626  ThreadRloc16Tlv rlocTlv;
3627  ThreadStatusTlv statusTlv;
3628  Ip6::MessageInfo messageInfo;
3629  Message *message;
3630 
3631  header.Init(kCoapTypeConfirmable, kCoapRequestPost);
3632  header.SetToken(Coap::Header::kDefaultTokenLength);
3633  header.AppendUriPathOptions(OPENTHREAD_URI_ADDRESS_SOLICIT);
3634  header.SetPayloadMarker();
3635 
3636  VerifyOrExit((message = mNetif.GetCoapClient().NewMessage(header)) != NULL, error = kThreadError_NoBufs);
3637 
3638  macAddr64Tlv.Init();
3639  macAddr64Tlv.SetMacAddr(*mNetif.GetMac().GetExtAddress());
3640  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&macAddr64Tlv, sizeof(macAddr64Tlv)));
3641 
3642  if (IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId))
3643  {
3644  rlocTlv.Init();
3645  rlocTlv.SetRloc16(GetRloc16(mPreviousRouterId));
3646  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&rlocTlv, sizeof(rlocTlv)));
3647  }
3648 
3649  statusTlv.Init();
3650  statusTlv.SetStatus(aStatus);
3651  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&statusTlv, sizeof(statusTlv)));
3652 
3653  SuccessOrExit(error = GetLeaderAddress(messageInfo.GetPeerAddr()));
3654  messageInfo.SetSockAddr(GetMeshLocal16());
3655  messageInfo.SetPeerPort(kCoapUdpPort);
3656 
3657  SuccessOrExit(error = mNetif.GetCoapClient().SendMessage(*message, messageInfo,
3658  &MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicitResponse, this));
3659 
3660  otLogInfoMle("Sent address solicit to %04x", HostSwap16(messageInfo.GetPeerAddr().mFields.m16[7]));
3661 
3662 exit:
3663 
3664  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
3665  {
3666  message->Free();
3667  }
3668 
3669  return error;
3670 }

3712 void MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicitResponse(void *aContext, otCoapHeader *aHeader, otMessage aMessage,
3713  const otMessageInfo *aMessageInfo, ThreadError aResult)
3714 {
3715  static_cast<MleRouter *>(aContext)->HandleAddressSolicitResponse(static_cast<Coap::Header *>(aHeader),
3716  static_cast<Message *>(aMessage),
3717  static_cast<const Ip6::MessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo),
3718  aResult);
3719 }
3720 
3721 void MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicitResponse(Coap::Header *aHeader, Message *aMessage,
3722  const Ip6::MessageInfo *aMessageInfo, ThreadError aResult)
3723 {
3724  (void)aResult;
3725  (void)aMessageInfo;
3726 
3727  ThreadStatusTlv statusTlv;
3728  ThreadRloc16Tlv rlocTlv;
3729  ThreadRouterMaskTlv routerMaskTlv;
3730  uint8_t routerId;
3731  Router *router;
3732  bool old;
3733 
3734  VerifyOrExit(aResult == kThreadError_None && aHeader != NULL && aMessage != NULL, ;);
3735 
3736  VerifyOrExit(aHeader->GetCode() == kCoapResponseChanged, ;);
3737 
3738  otLogInfoMle("Received address reply");
3739 
3740  SuccessOrExit(ThreadTlv::GetTlv(*aMessage, ThreadTlv::kStatus, sizeof(statusTlv), statusTlv));
3741  VerifyOrExit(statusTlv.IsValid(), ;);
3742 
3743  if (statusTlv.GetStatus() != statusTlv.kSuccess)
3744  {
3745  if (IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId))
3746  {
3747  if (HasChildren())
3748  {
3749  RemoveChildren();
3750  }
3751 
3752  SetRouterId(kInvalidRouterId);
3753  }
3754 
3755  ExitNow();
3756  }
3757 
3758  SuccessOrExit(ThreadTlv::GetTlv(*aMessage, ThreadTlv::kRloc16, sizeof(rlocTlv), rlocTlv));
3759  VerifyOrExit(rlocTlv.IsValid(), ;);
3760  routerId = GetRouterId(rlocTlv.GetRloc16());
3761  router = GetRouter(routerId);
3762  VerifyOrExit(router != NULL,);
3763 
3764  SuccessOrExit(ThreadTlv::GetTlv(*aMessage, ThreadTlv::kRouterMask, sizeof(routerMaskTlv), routerMaskTlv));
3765  VerifyOrExit(routerMaskTlv.IsValid(), ;);
3766 
3767  // if allocated routerId is different from previous routerId
3768  if (IsRouterIdValid(mPreviousRouterId) && routerId != mPreviousRouterId)
3769  {
3770  // reset children info if any
3771  if (HasChildren())
3772  {
3773  RemoveChildren();
3774  }
3775  }
3776 
3777  // assign short address
3778  SetRouterId(routerId);
3779 
3780  SuccessOrExit(SetStateRouter(GetRloc16(mRouterId)));
3781 
3782  router->mCost = 0;
3783 
3784  // copy router id information
3785  mRouterIdSequence = routerMaskTlv.GetIdSequence();
3786  mRouterIdSequenceLastUpdated = Timer::GetNow();
3787 
3788  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
3789  {
3790  old = mRouters[i].mAllocated;
3791  mRouters[i].mAllocated = routerMaskTlv.IsAssignedRouterIdSet(i);
3792 
3793  if (old && !mRouters[i].mAllocated)
3794  {
3795  mNetif.GetAddressResolver().Remove(i);
3796  }
3797  }
3798 
3799  // send link request
3800  SendLinkRequest(NULL);
3801 
3802  // send child id responses
3803  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
3804  {
3805  switch (mChildren[i].mState)
3806  {
3807  case Neighbor::kStateChildIdRequest:
3808  SendChildIdResponse(&mChildren[i]);
3809  break;
3810 
3811  case Neighbor::kStateLinkRequest:
3812  assert(false);
3813  break;
3814 
3815  case Neighbor::kStateInvalid:
3816  case Neighbor::kStateParentRequest:
3817  case Neighbor::kStateValid:
3818  case Neighbor::kStateRestored:
3819  case Neighbor::kStateChildUpdateRequest:
3820  break;
3821  }
3822  }
3823 
3824 exit:
3825  {}
3826 }
3827 
3828 void MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicit(void *aContext, otCoapHeader *aHeader, otMessage aMessage,
3829  const otMessageInfo *aMessageInfo)
3830 {
3831  static_cast<MleRouter *>(aContext)->HandleAddressSolicit(
3832  *static_cast<Coap::Header *>(aHeader), *static_cast<Message *>(aMessage),
3833  *static_cast<const Ip6::MessageInfo *>(aMessageInfo));
3834 }
3835 
3836 void MleRouter::HandleAddressSolicit(Coap::Header &aHeader, Message &aMessage, const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
3837 {
3838  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
3839  ThreadExtMacAddressTlv macAddr64Tlv;
3840  ThreadRloc16Tlv rlocTlv;
3841  ThreadStatusTlv statusTlv;
3842  uint8_t routerId = kInvalidRouterId;
3843  Router *router = NULL;
3844 
3845  VerifyOrExit(aHeader.GetType() == kCoapTypeConfirmable && aHeader.GetCode() == kCoapRequestPost,
3846  error = kThreadError_Parse);
3847 
3848  otLogInfoMle("Received address solicit");
3849 
3850  SuccessOrExit(error = ThreadTlv::GetTlv(aMessage, ThreadTlv::kExtMacAddress, sizeof(macAddr64Tlv), macAddr64Tlv));
3851  VerifyOrExit(macAddr64Tlv.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
3852 
3853  SuccessOrExit(error = ThreadTlv::GetTlv(aMessage, ThreadTlv::kStatus, sizeof(statusTlv), statusTlv));
3854  VerifyOrExit(statusTlv.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
3855 
3856  // see if allocation already exists
3857  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
3858  {
3859  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated &&
3860  memcmp(&mRouters[i].mMacAddr, macAddr64Tlv.GetMacAddr(), sizeof(mRouters[i].mMacAddr)) == 0)
3861  {
3862  ExitNow(routerId = i);
3863  }
3864  }
3865 
3866  // check the request reason
3867  switch (statusTlv.GetStatus())
3868  {
3869  case ThreadStatusTlv::kTooFewRouters:
3870  VerifyOrExit(GetActiveRouterCount() < mRouterUpgradeThreshold, ;);
3871  break;
3872 
3873  case ThreadStatusTlv::kHaveChildIdRequest:
3874  case ThreadStatusTlv::kParentPartitionChange:
3875  break;
3876 
3877  default:
3878  ExitNow(error = kThreadError_Parse);
3879  break;
3880  }
3881 
3882  if (ThreadTlv::GetTlv(aMessage, ThreadTlv::kRloc16, sizeof(rlocTlv), rlocTlv) == kThreadError_None)
3883  {
3884  // specific Router ID requested
3885  VerifyOrExit(rlocTlv.IsValid(), error = kThreadError_Parse);
3886  routerId = GetRouterId(rlocTlv.GetRloc16());
3887  router = GetRouter(routerId);
3888 
3889  if (router != NULL)
3890  {
3891  if (router->mAllocated && memcmp(&router->mMacAddr, macAddr64Tlv.GetMacAddr(), sizeof(router->mMacAddr)))
3892  {
3893  // requested Router ID is allocated to another device
3894  routerId = kInvalidRouterId;
3895  }
3896  else if (!router->mAllocated && router->mReclaimDelay)
3897  {
3898  // requested Router ID is deallocated but within ID_REUSE_DELAY period
3899  routerId = kInvalidRouterId;
3900  }
3901  else
3902  {
3903  routerId = AllocateRouterId(routerId);
3904  }
3905  }
3906  }
3907 
3908  // allocate new router id
3909  if (!IsRouterIdValid(routerId))
3910  {
3911  routerId = AllocateRouterId();
3912  }
3913  else
3914  {
3915  otLogInfoMle("router id requested and provided!");
3916  }
3917 
3918  router = GetRouter(routerId);
3919 
3920  if (router != NULL)
3921  {
3922  memcpy(&router->mMacAddr, macAddr64Tlv.GetMacAddr(), sizeof(router->mMacAddr));
3923  }
3924  else
3925  {
3926  otLogInfoMle("router address unavailable!");
3927  }
3928 
3929 exit:
3930 
3931  if (error == kThreadError_None)
3932  {
3933  SendAddressSolicitResponse(aHeader, routerId, aMessageInfo);
3934  }
3935 }
3936 
3937 void MleRouter::SendAddressSolicitResponse(const Coap::Header &aRequestHeader, uint8_t aRouterId,
3938  const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
3939 {
3940  ThreadError error = kThreadError_None;
3941  Coap::Header responseHeader;
3942  ThreadStatusTlv statusTlv;
3943  ThreadRouterMaskTlv routerMaskTlv;
3944  ThreadRloc16Tlv rlocTlv;
3945  Message *message;
3946 
3947  VerifyOrExit((message = mNetif.GetCoapServer().NewMessage(0)) != NULL, error = kThreadError_NoBufs);
3948 
3949  responseHeader.SetDefaultResponseHeader(aRequestHeader);
3950  responseHeader.SetPayloadMarker();
3951 
3952  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(responseHeader.GetBytes(), responseHeader.GetLength()));
3953 
3954  statusTlv.Init();
3955  statusTlv.SetStatus(!IsRouterIdValid(aRouterId) ? statusTlv.kNoAddressAvailable : statusTlv.kSuccess);
3956  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&statusTlv, sizeof(statusTlv)));
3957 
3958  if (IsRouterIdValid(aRouterId))
3959  {
3960  rlocTlv.Init();
3961  rlocTlv.SetRloc16(GetRloc16(aRouterId));
3962  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&rlocTlv, sizeof(rlocTlv)));
3963 
3964  routerMaskTlv.Init();
3965  routerMaskTlv.SetIdSequence(mRouterIdSequence);
3966  routerMaskTlv.ClearAssignedRouterIdMask();
3967 
3968  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
3969  {
3970  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated)
3971  {
3972  routerMaskTlv.SetAssignedRouterId(i);
3973  }
3974  }
3975 
3976  SuccessOrExit(error = message->Append(&routerMaskTlv, sizeof(routerMaskTlv)));
3977  }
3978 
3979  SuccessOrExit(error = mNetif.GetCoapServer().SendMessage(*message, aMessageInfo));
3980 
3981  otLogInfoMle("Sent address reply");
3982 
3983 exit:
3984 
3985  if (error != kThreadError_None && message != NULL)
3986  {
3987  message->Free();
3988  }
3989 }

3999 void MleRouter::HandleAddressRelease(Coap::Header &aHeader, Message &aMessage,
4000  const Ip6::MessageInfo &aMessageInfo)
4001 {
4002  ThreadRloc16Tlv rlocTlv;
4003  ThreadExtMacAddressTlv macAddr64Tlv;
4004  uint8_t routerId;
4005  Router *router;
4006 
4007  VerifyOrExit(aHeader.GetType() == kCoapTypeConfirmable &&
4008  aHeader.GetCode() == kCoapRequestPost, ;);
4009 
4010  otLogInfoMle("Received address release");
4011

4014 
4015  SuccessOrExit(ThreadTlv::GetTlv(aMessage, ThreadTlv::kExtMacAddress, sizeof(macAddr64Tlv), macAddr64Tlv));
4016  VerifyOrExit(macAddr64Tlv.IsValid(),);

4018  routerId = GetRouterId(rlocTlv.GetRloc16());

4020

4023 
4024  ReleaseRouterId(routerId);
4025 
4026  SuccessOrExit(mNetif.GetCoapServer().SendEmptyAck(aHeader, aMessageInfo));
4027 
4028  otLogInfoMle("Sent address release response");

4034 void MleRouter::FillConnectivityTlv(ConnectivityTlv &aTlv)
4035 {
4036  ConnectivityTlv &tlv = aTlv;
4037  uint8_t cost;
4038  uint8_t lqi;
4039  uint8_t numChildren = 0;
4040 
4041  for (int i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
4042  {
4043  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
4044  {
4045  numChildren++;
4046  }
4047  }
4048 
4049  if ((mMaxChildrenAllowed - numChildren) < (mMaxChildrenAllowed / 3))
4050  {
4051  tlv.SetParentPriority(-1);
4052  }
4053  else
4054  {
4055  tlv.SetParentPriority(0);
4056  }
4057 
4058  // compute leader cost and link qualities
4059  tlv.SetLinkQuality1(0);
4060  tlv.SetLinkQuality2(0);
4061  tlv.SetLinkQuality3(0);
4062 
4063  cost = mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mCost;
4064 
4065  switch (GetDeviceState())
4066  {
4067  case kDeviceStateDisabled:
4068  case kDeviceStateDetached:
4069  assert(false);
4070  break;
4071 
4072  case kDeviceStateChild:
4073  switch (mParent.mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor()))
4074  {
4075  case 1:
4076  tlv.SetLinkQuality1(tlv.GetLinkQuality1() + 1);
4077  break;
4078 
4079  case 2:
4080  tlv.SetLinkQuality2(tlv.GetLinkQuality2() + 1);
4081  break;
4082 
4083  case 3:
4084  tlv.SetLinkQuality3(tlv.GetLinkQuality3() + 1);
4085  break;
4086  }
4087 
4088  cost += LqiToCost(mParent.mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor()));
4089  break;
4090 
4091  case kDeviceStateRouter:
4092  cost += GetLinkCost(mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mNextHop);
4093 
4094  if (!IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[GetLeaderId()].mNextHop) || GetLinkCost(GetLeaderId()) < cost)
4095  {
4096  cost = GetLinkCost(GetLeaderId());
4097  }
4098 
4099  break;
4100 
4101  case kDeviceStateLeader:
4102  cost = 0;
4103  break;
4104  }
4105 
4106  tlv.SetActiveRouters(0);
4107 
4108  for (int i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
4109  {
4110  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated)
4111  {
4112  tlv.SetActiveRouters(tlv.GetActiveRouters() + 1);
4113  }
4114 
4115  if (mRouters[i].mState != Neighbor::kStateValid || i == mRouterId)
4116  {
4117  continue;
4118  }
4119 
4120  lqi = mRouters[i].mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor());
4121 
4122  if (lqi > mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut)
4123  {
4124  lqi = mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut;
4125  }
4126 
4127  switch (lqi)
4128  {
4129  case 1:
4130  tlv.SetLinkQuality1(tlv.GetLinkQuality1() + 1);
4131  break;
4132 
4133  case 2:
4134  tlv.SetLinkQuality2(tlv.GetLinkQuality2() + 1);
4135  break;
4136 
4137  case 3:
4138  tlv.SetLinkQuality3(tlv.GetLinkQuality3() + 1);
4139  break;
4140  }
4141  }
4142 
4143  tlv.SetLeaderCost((cost < kMaxRouteCost) ? cost : static_cast<uint8_t>(kMaxRouteCost));
4144  tlv.SetIdSequence(mRouterIdSequence);
4145  tlv.SetSedBufferSize(1280);
4146  tlv.SetSedDatagramCount(1);
4147 }

4156

4158 
4159 exit:
4160  return error;

4163 ThreadError MleRouter::AppendChildAddresses(Message &aMessage, Child &aChild)
4164 {
4165  ThreadError error;
4166  Tlv tlv;
4167  AddressRegistrationEntry entry;
4168  Lowpan::Context context;
4169  uint8_t length = 0;
4170  uint8_t startOffset = static_cast<uint8_t>(aMessage.GetLength());
4171 
4172  tlv.SetType(Tlv::kAddressRegistration);
4173  SuccessOrExit(error = aMessage.Append(&tlv, sizeof(tlv)));
4174 
4175  for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address) / sizeof(aChild.mIp6Address[0]); i++)
4176  {
4177  if (aChild.mIp6Address[i].IsUnspecified())
4178  {
4179  break;
4180  }
4181 
4182  if (mNetif.GetNetworkDataLeader().GetContext(aChild.mIp6Address[i], context) == kThreadError_None)
4183  {
4184  // compressed entry
4185  entry.SetContextId(context.mContextId);
4186  entry.SetIid(aChild.mIp6Address[i].GetIid());
4187  }
4188  else
4189  {
4190  // uncompressed entry
4191  entry.SetUncompressed();
4192  entry.SetIp6Address(aChild.mIp6Address[i]);
4193  }
4194 
4195  SuccessOrExit(error = aMessage.Append(&entry, entry.GetLength()));
4196  length += entry.GetLength();
4197  }
4198 
4199  tlv.SetLength(length);
4200  aMessage.Write(startOffset, sizeof(tlv), &tlv);
4201 
4202 exit:
4203  return error;
4204 }

4206 void MleRouter::FillRouteTlv(RouteTlv &tlv)
4207 {
4208  uint8_t routeCount = 0;
4209  uint8_t linkCost;
4210  uint8_t cost;
4211 
4212  tlv.SetRouterIdSequence(mRouterIdSequence);
4213  tlv.ClearRouterIdMask();
4214 
4215  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
4216  {
4217  if (mRouters[i].mAllocated == false)
4218  {
4219  continue;
4220  }
4221 
4222  tlv.SetRouterId(i);
4223 
4224  if (i == mRouterId)
4225  {
4226  tlv.SetLinkQualityIn(routeCount, 0);
4227  tlv.SetLinkQualityOut(routeCount, 0);
4228  tlv.SetRouteCost(routeCount, 1);
4229  }
4230  else
4231  {
4232  linkCost = GetLinkCost(i);
4233 
4234  if (!IsRouterIdValid(mRouters[i].mNextHop))
4235  {
4236  cost = linkCost;
4237  }
4238  else
4239  {
4240  cost = mRouters[i].mCost + GetLinkCost(mRouters[i].mNextHop);
4241 
4242  if (linkCost < cost)
4243  {
4244  cost = linkCost;
4245  }
4246  }
4247 
4248  if (cost >= kMaxRouteCost)
4249  {
4250  cost = 0;
4251  }
4252 
4253  tlv.SetRouteCost(routeCount, cost);
4254  tlv.SetLinkQualityOut(routeCount, mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut);
4255 
4256  if (isAssignLinkQuality &&
4257  (memcmp(mRouters[i].mMacAddr.m8, mAddr64.m8, OT_EXT_ADDRESS_SIZE) == 0))
4258  {
4259  tlv.SetLinkQualityIn(routeCount, mAssignLinkQuality);
4260  }
4261  else
4262  {
4263  tlv.SetLinkQualityIn(routeCount,
4264  mRouters[i].mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor()));
4265  }
4266  }
4267 
4268  routeCount++;
4269  }
4270 
4271  tlv.SetRouteDataLength(routeCount);
4272 }

4280  SuccessOrExit(error = aMessage.Append(&tlv, sizeof(Tlv) + tlv.GetLength()));
4281 exit:
4282  return error;
4283 }

4315 bool MleRouter::HasOneNeighborwithComparableConnectivity(const RouteTlv &aRoute, uint8_t aRouterId)
4316 {
4317  bool rval = true;
4318  uint8_t localLqi = 0;
4319  uint8_t peerLqi = 0;
4320  uint8_t routerCount = 0;
4321 
4322  // process local neighbor routers
4323  for (uint8_t i = 0; i <= kMaxRouterId; i++)
4324  {
4325  if (i == mRouterId)
4326  {
4327  routerCount++;
4328  continue;
4329  }
4330 
4331  // check if neighbor is valid
4332  if (mRouters[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
4333  {
4334  // if neighbor is just peer
4335  if (i == aRouterId)
4336  {
4337  routerCount++;
4338  continue;
4339  }
4340 
4341  localLqi = mRouters[i].mLinkInfo.GetLinkQuality(mNetif.GetMac().GetNoiseFloor());
4342 
4343  if (localLqi > mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut)
4344  {
4345  localLqi = mRouters[i].mLinkQualityOut;
4346  }
4347 
4348  if (localLqi >= 2)
4349  {
4350  // check if this neighbor router is in peer Route64 TLV
4351  if (aRoute.IsRouterIdSet(i) == false)
4352  {
4353  ExitNow(rval = false);
4354  }
4355 
4356  // get the peer's two-way lqi to this router
4357  peerLqi = aRoute.GetLinkQualityIn(routerCount);
4358 
4359  if (peerLqi > aRoute.GetLinkQualityOut(routerCount))
4360  {
4361  peerLqi = aRoute.GetLinkQualityOut(routerCount);
4362  }
4363 
4364  // compare local lqi to this router with peer's
4365  if (peerLqi >= localLqi)
4366  {
4367  routerCount++;
4368  continue;
4369  }
4370  else
4371  {
4372  ExitNow(rval = false);
4373  }
4374  }
4375 
4376  routerCount++;
4377  }
4378  }
4379 
4380 exit:
4381  return rval;
4382 }

4412 void MleRouter::RemoveChildren(void)
4413 {
4414  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
4415  {
4416  switch (mChildren[i].mState)
4417  {
4418  case Neighbor::kStateValid:
4419  mNetif.SetStateChangedFlags(OT_THREAD_CHILD_REMOVED);
4420 
4421  // Fall-through to next case
4422 
4423  case Neighbor::kStateChildUpdateRequest:
4424  case Neighbor::kStateRestored:
4425  RemoveStoredChild(mChildren[i].mValid.mRloc16);
4426  break;
4427 
4428  default:
4429  break;
4430  }
4431 
4432  mChildren[i].mState = Neighbor::kStateInvalid;
4433  }

4436 bool MleRouter::HasSmallNumberOfChildren(void)
4437 {
4438  uint8_t numChildren = 0;
4439  uint8_t routerCount = GetActiveRouterCount();
4440 
4441  VerifyOrExit(routerCount > mRouterDowngradeThreshold, ;);
4442 
4443  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < mMaxChildrenAllowed; i++)
4444  {
4445  if (mChildren[i].mState == Neighbor::kStateValid)
4446  {
4447  numChildren++;
4448  }
4449  }
4450 
4451  return numChildren < (routerCount - mRouterDowngradeThreshold) * 3;
4452 
4453 exit:
4454  return false;
4455 }
